comments: The flat was bright, comfortable and clean and Adriano was pleasant and gracious about accommodating us at the last minute. The Brixton tube was a very short walk away and there were plenty of buses. There are lots of fast food restaurants, banks, and shops along the main street.

We stayed with Adriano and Valerio for a week when first moving to London. The apartment is great and very clean compared to a lot of places we've seen in London. Situated very close to Brixton tube and good bus links to central London. Thanks guys!

it was all in all the perfect week!
chilton is supernice, she put up flowers bouquets for us and fresh croissants were waiting for us in the kitchen when we arrived!
the apartment is sweet, the terrace is just amazing, the location is great. 
internet is really fast and included.
all kinds of different stores are around the area, a tube station and several bus stations.
 there is a great market on saturday. 

we had a fantastic time!
i highly recommend this place!! :))

I'll start with the host, and then move on to the apartment:

I only saw a little bit of her, because of her work, and my work, but she explained everything very well and was very warm and welcoming. I must appreciate her patience and helpfulness, when in the middle of a work commitment, she managed to have the duplicate set of keys delivered to me ( since i managed to lock myself outside the apartment). She was also very responsive throughout my stay.

The apartment was very very beautiful

I loved staying here. The bedroom was a good size, the living room, the kitchen and the bathroom were Extremely spacious. The location was just perfect. It was extremely well-connected... the tube and bus stations were not even 2 minutes walking, almost over looking the Portobello market, in a very lively area.

The terrace was of course my favorite part, and i loved spending all my free time there.

The apartment was very tastefully done.

I would stay here the next time i'm in London, and I would strongly recommend this place to anyone even remotely considering this apartment.

Great location. Plenty to do just steps outside the door and super easy to get to the Notting Hill Gate tube stop to venture out a bit more. Walking distance to Portobello Market and Hyde Park.  Loved the terrace. Bedroom is small, but makes up for it with the space in the rest of the place. Host gifted a bottle of wine and muffins for breakfast. Was really hospitable and wanted to make sure we had a great stay. Quick to respond when I had a question during my stay as well.
Great location, perfect place and size for my business trip in London. Not that I used the ktichen, it was there if I needed it. Perfect, and Chilton was a lovely and accommodating host.

Highly recommended.  Perfect location -- around the corner from the Notting Hill Gate subway station with great restaurants and world class shopping steps outside the door.  Beautifully decorated, bright and sunny windows. Clean.  Super responsive and caring host (welcomed us with croissants and fruit).  We really enjoyed breakfasts on the apartment's rooftop terrace overlooking the restaurants and people-watching. Enjoy.
Vestalia is a terrific hostess and I would absolutely recommend her flat to anyone. It's so cosy and homey and conveniently located in a lovely corner of Notting Hill.
The host canceled my reservation 4 days before arrival.

We had a fantastic stay in Chilton V's apartment. It is located in a perfect area, about 1min from the Tube and lots of shops and cafes around. Despite the busy area, the apartment itself, and the bedroom in particular, were very quiet and we had no disturbances. Chilton was there to greet us when we arrived and was a very friendly and accommodating host. She showed us around, talked to us about the area and had very kindly left a bottle of wine and some snacks for us. I would definitely stay there again.

Fantastic!
The apartment is really beautiful.
She is an amazing host, she did everything to make us feel at home. She left the fridge full of food for us. Tooth brushes and everything we could need on the bathroom, etc. 
Perfect location! On Saturdays you're Right on the beginning of portobello market. Lots of things to do walking distance, and metro station too.
Absolutely recommended for anyone.
Would definitely stay again.

Perfect solution for a London visit. Great apartment with nice living room, great balcony and located 2 mins from notting hill gate tube station, and 5 minutes from portabello road.
All the facilities were waiting for us - towels, beddings, washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen.

Next time in london - i know where I'm staying.

Its a gem, Chilton is an amazing host, she left drinks and food for us, along with some choclates, the apartment is one minute from the tube and lotsof shops and resturants and bars around the cornor. I wud definitaly stay there again
Very nice apartment - Clean, tidy and fantastic location. Will definitely stay there again

My husband and I rented the flat for a 9 day stay in London and had a wonderful time there. The one-bedroom flat is cozy, nicely decorated,  and has a lovely terrace, where we could enjoy breakfast on sunny mornings. Chilton was nice and welcoming, and let us feeling at home, as she showed us how everything worked in the house. Great  neighborhood, a 2 minute walk from Notting Hill gate, near the entrance of Portobello Market,  easy access to everywhere in London, either by Tube or bus (there is a bus stop in front of the building). We were happy about our choice, it added to the excellent time we had in London, we definetely recommend it.

Adriano was a fantastic host. We felt very at home while staying there. Our first morning we woke up and saw the dining table set for breakfast which was much appreciated. His flat is conveniently located a block from the tube station, with a number of shops and restaurants in the area as well. His place was very clean and tidy, overall just a fantastic experience.

The flat was comfortable and in a great location in Notting Hill, exceptionally close to Portobello Rd and Notting Hill Gate. The terrace was excellent for relaxing and people-watching outdoors. Our host was very accommodating and ensured our stay was enjoyable.

The apartment is  very nice and an excellent location for all those who want to discover the west of London: Its location at Notting Hill Gate (2 Minutes) makes it a perfect base for discovering Notting Hill but Kensington as well.

We stayed for 7 days in this lovely apartment. The location is excellent, very close to the tube station. And in a lively neighbourhood. Everything was clean and fresh. The terrace is great (when it is not raining :-)) We would certainly recommend this place!
Great place. Amazing location. Would for sure rent again.

Such a great location - seconds from the Tube, short walk to Hyde Park, and right smack in the middle of Notting Hill.  Vestalia was away but made perfect arrangements for getting the key, and she was available by email and phone if needed.  Flat was roomy and comfortable.  Shower was a little quirky but Vestalia left instructions on dealing with it and all was fine.  Would definitely stay there again!
Great location and flat. Near tube, porobello market, and parks. Neat local shops around. Has everything you need for your stay in London. Would recommend entirely.
Great Host and very accommodating!  We had a change in plans and she rearranged her schedule to fit us in a couple more days.  Love the area and home...best spot in London!!  We will be back:)

This was a great location.  Easy walk to everything in Notting Hill and very close to a key metro station.

The apartment was laid out well and was easy to find.  The free WiFi and the roof deck were superb.

Check in/out were a breeze.

The apartment is full of the owner's stuff, so closet space is somewhat limited.

The bed was adequate, but not very comfortable.

The kitchen was a bit messy when we arrived.  There were ants on the counter and the refrigerator was smelly.  There were two expired containers of milk in the fridge.  We wiped things down and things were fine.  In the host's defense, she thought we would be arriving a day later than we did.  However, the milk (and some of the other stuff) in the fridge was pretty old and should have been thrown away weeks earlier.

All in all, I would stay here again, especially if it is going to be a short stay (or if I were travelling alone).  

This was my first BnB experience and I was very pleased with how everything transpired.
Wonderfull host full stop.
My stay was fine, full of bad luck and the host did her best to remedy things.

Great location and great space! Bed was a little uncomfortable and there was a bit of an ant problem, but that didn't bother me. We took full advantage of the wonderful terrace as we were blessed with nice weather. Host was very welcoming and thorough with details. Would definitely book again.
A lovely split-level apartment at Excellent location, only minuts away from both Metro and bus stops.
This was a great place to stay in London, it really was in an ideal spot. Lovely place, lovely host, a great first time with AirBnb. Absolutely recommend booking this place!!

One of the most beautiful apartments I stayed at. The terrace with the view was amazing, didn't rain once. We had a minor ant problem in the kitchen and there was a weird buzzing sound in the bedroom (probably the bathroom's heater), but overall, this is my favourite AirBnB apartment so far. Location is perfect right infront of Starbucks and Notting Hill Gate station, right by Portobello Road. The apartment also has beautiful sculptures and paintings. We left the apartment dirty, and host was mad about this. Sorry for that.

The flat was incredibly central, right above all the action in Notting Hill. Our relatives were jealous and wished they lived there. The sound from the traffic was surprisingly not too bad either eventhough we were literally on the main intersection.

Pros: Chilton was kind, responsive and left some treats for us when we arrived. The terrace was a lovely spot to enjoy the hustle and bustle without being in it. Lots of nice artwork on the walls with comfy couches. Bedroom is small but cosy.

Cons: It was not spotless but clean enough. A little ant problem in the kitchen so best to keep the dishes clean and food wrapped up (although didn't bother us too much).

This is a great unit to base for a trip to London. Right in the heart of Notting Hill, the tube is 100m away. Easy access to grocery shops, clothes shops and even a Jamie Oliver cafe!
There is a little patio out the back, great for an afternoon beer and snack. 
Chilton was great, constant communication. There was a slight problem during our stay and Chilton fixed it up as soon as possible.
Everything was as stated, wifi, kitchen, bathroom, double bed. 
No problems recommending to anyone.

We were lucky enough to find this great deal just in the nick of time before our mom visited from afar and booked for the beginning and end of September. The place was lovely, modern, homey and so superbly located we wanted it for our own! 

Although, primarily, this bedsit is designed for the comfort of two people we were able to all three stay there as privacy was not essential for us and the space comes stocked with a folding cot style bed and the split level saves space and offered enough privacy for us. 

The kitchen is very well equipped and the space has many well thought out home comforts with a unique modern minimalistic style. At the beginning of September it was a bit warm in there during the hot spell in London but there were two large fans provided which saved the day. We also enjoyed the use of the Brita filter, lovely french candles and the organic feel of the place.

The best thing about the place is the ease of access to all the travel routes be it Tube, Bus, DLR or even ferry boat which are all minutes away and all under a half hour to get to centre of London. There is a FANTASTIC modern restaurant serving very reasonably priced gourmet Indian food two steps down which has awesome service and superb dishes as well as a 24 hour food shop around the corner with all sorts of goodies therein.

John was a pleasure to deal with and always easy to reach. We had our share of apprehensions about renting anything off the web as we were on a budget looking for that nice find but only ran in to a lot of scammers. Quick and honest communication back and forth with John put all our worries to rest. 

This place has our seal of approval. :)

*I highly recommend staying here* I really enjoyed staying at John Wallace's home in Canary Wharf. As you can see from the pictures, it's beautiful! The flat has a very modern and clean design (*great soaps, candles and of course teas!). The location was PERFECT and CONVENIENT! Canary wharf is a great place for families, couples, and also an excellent location for business professionals to make connections. 

Staying with my boyfriend at John's apartment in canary wharf was an incredible experience! It made my first trip to London very special and I look to visit again soon!

Me and my two brothers spent four nights at John's place in Canary wharf and we liked it. Canary Wharf is a cool area with mainly pretty new built houses and skyscrapers. It was easy to take the the tube to London Bridge (only 3 stops) and from there further on. 
The apartment looked pretty much like in the pictures. The bathroom with tub and nice toiletteries was very appreciated and also the well equipped kitchen. Everything worked out very well with John, he was helpful and gave us useful information before we went to London. We were not supposed to meet him but because of my misstake we didn't check out (or maybe I should say didn't check out at all) in time and it was really embarassing. So when we came to get our stuff before heading of to the airport John were there preparing for the coming tenants. I felt so ashamed and had no good excuse accept brain-fag but John handled the situation very well and I'm glad he didn't kill me ;) 
It was an unhappy ending of a great stay, but on the other hand I got the chance to meet him in person and that was nice.

The only bad thing in my oppinon was that it was a bit dirty on the floor and in the bathroom.  

I could recommend to stay at John's place.

We had a most wonderful stay with Adriano and Valerio.  They are both interesting and interested hosts who serve a delicious cappuccino with breakfast in the morninig.  Their place is small but clean and comfy.  Central London is a short bus or tube ride ... very convenient.  We look forward to returning to London and staying with them again.

the staying was really nice, the appartment was new, and nice, but just two things i didn't like so much:
- we never meet John, neither at arrival
- we where 3 pax and we found just 2 beds ready, the 3° we had to mail John to ask which was, and we had to (Website hidden by Airbnb) could be a little moore clean :)
This apartment is great and Chil is such a wonderful host. We will definitely stay here again when we come back to London.

We very much enjoyed staying in Chilton's flat - it was comfortable, cozy (apart from the bathroom which was a little cool) and centrally located with excellent transport links/food shops. The weather was not sunny enough to encourage us out onto the little west facing terrace but I think this would be lovely in summer time. Streets on both sides of the flat were pretty busy which is fun for people watching but this didn't affect our sleeping - the bedroom window is onto a light well which is a lot quieter.
On a practical note the kitchen has a proper hob, microwave and decent sized fridge. Broadband speed was okay - around 5-6Mbps.
All in all we are very likely to stay here again - particularly as our friends live just up the road.

We stayed at Chilton's flat for 3 nights and we had a good time. We arrived a bit earlier that the check in but we were able to leave our luggage in the meantime the cleaning was ending. The house is very comfortable and perfectly located!! With a nice terrace, PLUS!! The kitchen was quite dirty and the bathroom was a little cool.
Great location.  Lovely hostess.  Apartment was easy to access the Tube.  A bit noisy, but near all the Nottinghill spots.

Appartment lovely, great terrace for people watching. Is a minutes walk from nottinghill gate station. Chilton was a good host, easy to contact if needed. 
Would definitely stay here again if back in London

Ahhh, Christmas in London!  Chilton was great with pre stay and during stay!  Excellent communication!  The apartment itself is located in such a great neighborhood to base a visit to London to.  The metro is SO close.  Portobello Market!  Wonderful pubs!  Would stay there again in Chilton's wonderful flat!  Thanks for everything!

Nice and well situated apartment. Few meters from Notting Hill Gate Underground Station (central line quick fast access to city center).
Ideal apartment to stay while visiting London. 
Host was easy to reach and very efficient solving any questions we had.
Highly recommend. 
Hope to repeat when we come back to London.
We loved our stay at this beautiful apartment in Notting Hill. You cannot beat the location and Chil was the perfect host. I would definitely  recommend this place to everyone.
Great host. Very flexible arriving and departure times. The location is absolutely stunning next to many bus lines, the underground central line and the Porto Bello Market.

Chil welcommed us with a bottle of wine, coffee and cookies! 
The apartment is beautiful, it shows she really cares for design (decor, paintings, furniture). 
The location was just what I was looking for. 4 blocks away from Hyde Park, in a cosy neighborhood... Definitely a wonderful stay guaranteed.

I'm not sure which of us misunderstood the situation, but I was not aware that Adriano and his cousin would be in residence...I thought I was renting the apartment to myself. Nonetheless, he was a very gracious host. The neighborhood is not a good one, and anyone renting here should be aware of that. I would not walk in that area at night under any circumstances. The apartment is spotlessly clean though.

This is a great place to stay! Adriano and Valerio are wonderful hosts, super friendly, welcoming, and respectful. Valerio is the perfect guy to talk to and make you feel welcome in a warm home environment.
The bedroom is very comfortable, my mom and I stayed with them for a few days and felt like home. The bathroom and flat were very clean :) The location has close access to the tube station and many buses, food stores, and ATMs.
Valerio kindly prepared coffee and set breakfast for us every day :)
Adriano is very knowledgeable of the city and places you should visit and ways to get there. He advised us on places to go, sights, and everything.
Thanks for being so nice guys! If I ever go back to London this will definitely be the place I hope to stay.

5***** Stars for Adriano & Valerio
If you are looking for a nice, cosy and super clean room in London, you will be happy to stay at Adrianos and Valerios place. The both are friendly and welcoming hosts. They serve you a good breakfast with italian cappuccino in the morning. And if you are interested you can also have a nice discussion with Adriano and learn a lot about European culture and history. Thanks again for that!:) We just stayed one night at their appartment, but if we come back we will definitely try to stay at this place.
Thanks again and best regards from Cologne
// Steffi & Nino

the place is in a quiet side road, very convenient (a 2 minute slow walk) to the tube on Victoria line. The room is a bit small but very comfortable, clean and well organized, including wireless internet! The bathroom is spacious and clean.  Adriano is a wonderful host, very kind and ready to help. Also he prepares a fantastic cappuccino at breakfast!
My daughter and I felt this was a great place, we stayed there 3 nights and felt safe and welcomed.  We warmly recommend Adriano's place. Grazie Adriano e ciao!
Giusi & Elena
The room was as shown. Didn't have access to the living room much. I'd pick another place to stay closer to downtown I think next time. London was a great experience.

I had a great stay with Adriano! He was very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. The flat was clean, and the room was very nice. The area/neighbourhood is very multicultural - making it interesting yet safe. I had no problems going there alone at night, and neither should anyone else, provided they don't mind the smells and sounds from the big Afro-Caribbean community - which is far more exciting than the blandness of the regular tourist places.

adriano is a sweet and totally gentle guy. his house is tiny, but SUPER clean and cozy--he keeps his bathroom cleaner than any hotel i have ever been in! the bed is very comfortable with a really nice comforter, his cappuccino is excellent, and the conversation is interesting and friendly. the house is all the way at the end of the victoria line, but it's a really easy ride from central london and only a two block walk from the tube stop. he really goes out of his way to make you feel welcome and comfortable. i would stay there again, without hesitation.

We stayed with Adriano for 5 nights on our visit to London.  His apartment is small but spotless and the bed in the bedroom you stay in is comfortable, perfect for two people (and our backpacks!). 

We didn't spend a lot of time at the apartment, but Adriano was a great, friendly host with fantastic recommendations on the area and even set out breakfast and made us cappuccino the first morning of our stay! 

The apartment is three blocks from the Brixton tube station, about 10 minutes into the city center by train so the location was great.  Brixton itself is a lively neighborhood with an outdoor market, a movie theatre and a few pubs close to the apartment. 

 
If you are looking only for a bedroom to crash, and a clean, safe and centrally located place to stay while in London, I'd highly recommend staying with Adriano!

Staying with Adriano & Valerio was a plasure, I felt just like at home. Adriano is a very intereting man to have a conversation with, exchane expiriences and opinions. He keeps the apratment very clean with an unbelievable amount of fresh clean towles.
The location is within 2-3 min walk from a tube station, many bus lines & many many shops of all kinds.
I enjoyed my stay very much and very likely to stay with them again on my next trip to London.
Clean, tidy, close to the underground and bus. Adriano is friendly and trustful. I had a good time.

If you want a cheap and super clean accomodation in London you should book your room at Adriano's place.
Adriano is extremely friendly and he put me at ease since I arrived at his flat.
I enjoyed so much his neighborhood, Brixton is amazing and I don't share the opinion of Monique that said it's not a good one.
Probably she didn't like the multicultural aspect of Brixton, while I chose that district intentionally.
As other people wrote Adriano's flat is really close to Brixton Tube Station and there are many bus connections through useful stops and to the City (some of them operate a 24h service)
If you're planning to spend few days in London don't hesitate to contact Adriano!

This was my first stop in an "All-AirBNB" Trip and let me tell you that it was a great place to start. Adriano was not only helpful but he offers a beautiful room with all the amenities you'll need if you're traveling to London.

Location is key and he's right next to the Brixton Station which means that in about 20 minutes or so you can be anywhere you want to be. Beware though that the London Underground is undergoing construction on the weekends and some lines are shut down, nothing that a little bit of planning can solve.

The bed was comfortable, warm and I slept like a baby. Everything was spotless and I couldn't have felt more safe and secure. I'd stay there any time.

Three cheers to Adriano and his beautiful London Flat.

G

Super perfect 5 star place to stay. 

Clean and tidy flatt with a real good feeling to it and privacy. Adriano made me feel very safe and welcome.

The flat is only 5 minutes walking distance to the Brixton underground so it was real easy for me to get to my destinations rather quickly.

Thank you Adriano you made my stay extra nice.

All the best, Berit Reaver

My boyfriend and I just came back from London where we stayed a couple of days at Adriano's place.
We really enjoyed this experience!
First of all, the house is located in zone 2,  2 mins walk to Brixton tube station (victoria line) and buses to the city centre 24/24 which is very practical. There is everything one need in the area: shops, bars, restaurants, supermarkets.
Then, the house is as shown, our bedroom was cozy and absolutely comfy, and we really appreciated that everything was tidy and super clean including the bathroom which is very important. Moreover, the area was quiet and we slept very well :)
Adriano was so nice and gentle, it was a pleasure to stay at his place. He welcomed us and made us feel home right away. He is a very friendly person and we appreciated nice and interesting conversations with him!
We will definitely go back to his place for our next trip to London and we obviously highly recommend everyone to go to Adriano's.
Thank you so much, we had an amazing stay!

Adriano was a thoughtful host, offering touristic suggestions as well as a splendid cappuccino. The room's easy proximity to the Brixton tube station is a plus.  It was a friendly and hassle-free stay.

This place was perfect to stay in London. Very near the tube, very clean and tidy. Adriano is a very nice guy, polite, clever and very helpful with us. Valerio is also a very ice room mate. Definitely recommended
The host canceled my reservation 4 days before arrival.

Adriano has many good reviews,so i m gonna  to say same things that other people already said.Adriano is a very good host,friendly,he has a great sense of hospitality.Very nice home,clean and bright,close to Underground station.5 Stars!
Adriano was quick to help me rent on a couple of hours notice. Clean and lovely reception.

Adriano was out ot town. I stayed with his cousin Valerio, who was
very nice, clean and kept the place tidy. I felt safe there. The flat is 2 minute walk to the tube station. I had a good time and would recommend Adriano's flat to Airbnb travellers.

I spent 2 nights at Adriano's flat and enjoyed my experience there very much.  Adriano and his cousin Val were friendly, pleasant and easy to get along with. The flat and my room were both very clean, tidy and organised, yet I also felt very much at home too.  The neighbourhood was interesting and colourful; and I really enjoyed walking along the street - the vibe was fantastic!  I had a wonderful experience staying at A's flat.  Antony :)

We really enjoyed our stay with Adriano. He is a great host, very welcoming, thoughtful and molto simpatico. We felt very much at home staying in his cosy apartment.

His apartment is also in a good position for visitors to London, close to a variety of shops, to buses and the tube station. Brixton Market and the Village have great food and are fun to explore.

We definitely hope to be returning to stay with Adriano when we are next in London.

Andriano is a great host. Very sociable, nice and friendly talks. the Flat is clean, very clean. Bed is confortable and bathroom, very clean one, is quite big. The place is very close to Brixton tube and it's really convenient to get to central London.
I highly recommend John's apartment. Clean, I enjoyed the outlet for foreigners. Too bad I could not meet John.

Highly recommended! The three of us stayed at John’s place for 6 nights. John is a excellent host and he was there to welcome us on our arrival. He’s provided good information with what to do, what to see, and various tips. Guide books and maps for our use are also available in the apartment. The place is nicely decorated in the modern style, warm, cozy, well appointed, accessible and a short walk to the Canary Wharf underground tube with awesome shopping, restaurants and supermarket nearby.  The kitchen is well equipped if you need to cook or dine-in. Free Wi-Fi was also provided, so we got to use our iphones/ipad for research and it was fantastic to be able to call back home to the USA in the evenings at no charge. The apt was equipped with a clothes washer/dryer as we tried our best to pack lighter (not easy) for this total 2 week vacation. The street is quiet with just the occasional vehicle driving by. We appreciate John's honesty and he even went out of his way to drop-off my sister package that was accidentally left behind at the apt. Thanks John for everything and we hope to come back to London in the near future (be our guest, no charge of course, if you ever come to San Francisco Bay Area).

Can't recommend John's place enough, it has everything.
Three of us were very comfortable.  If I worked back in Canary Wharf I would be happy to stay in the apartment Monday to Friday.  So close to shops, restaurants, work, transport - yet dead peaceful during the night.  Only woken up by my natural body clock.
Lovely Bathroom and quality toiletries, fully fitted kitchen, great TV with free view, telephone and internet.
Got to the Natural history museum in 1/2 hour. Got home from Covent Garden after a show in the evening - in 20 minutes. 
Remember the apartment is a Studio but compared to a hotel room - well, there is no comparison.  Give me John's place any stay.!!  Thanks again John, see you again soon I hope.

John was an extremely friendly host.  I never got to meet him but we spent over 20 minutes on the phone, mainly with me pestering him with questions.  He gave some very nice insights on where to go.  The apartment is very well maintained.  Everything promised was delivered.  It's definitely a London size apartment but it is laid out very efficiently.  It will  comfortably sleep a couple plus one more.  The neighborhood has not much going on but it is very close to the subway station.  Thanks John.  Will let you know when i'm back in town

This is a stunning little apartment. While working on an exhibition being held at the ExCel conference centre staying here just a few minutes walk from Canary Wharf tube station was such a welcomed alternative to an expensive hotel. I am writing this review coz John, the host has a great place and I highly recommend it. Book it as long as I don't want it! I will most certainly be using this apartment again.

The apartment is perfect. It worked as a place to sleep, a place to hold a small meeting, as a place to relax after a long day. It was a sterling find.

Thank you John for all the special little touches. Awesome.

I love this place. Tiny down side...the key is quite tricky and I got stuck outside battling with the lock for 10mins.

The flat was in immaculate condition.  It is a 5 minute walk to the Canary Wharf tube and the Jubilee line.  Using the tube, I made it to my appointments in Baker Street (the opposite side of town) in 35 minutes door to door.  Central London and even Camden are more convenient than from some places in town.

There are numerous shopping centers, restaurants, pubs, bars and other areas of interest nearby. 

John is a wonderful and conscientious host. There is nothing we asked that he didn't know.

I will rent this flat again and recommend it to my friends.

This apartment is AWESOME and John was amazing to rent from.  He had the apartment clean and all set when I arrived.  He had even thought of a number of extra amenities, which were nice.  He had left a couple of voltage converters in the apartment, which was a lifesaver because both my girlfriend and I had forgotten them.

In short, I can't possibly recommend this apartment highly enough.  It was awesome and helped us have an awesome week in London.
The secret's out. A wonderful compact studio with such a great use of space. John (as a host) was superb responding to all queries prior/post stay immediately. Will return again.

We just returned from our trip and staying at John's place was great! John met us there to show us the ropes, gave us some directions, and about a short cut to his place from the metro. Talk about convenient, and it was a nice little flat with adequate room for 4. We used the micro & kitchen and the cute little washer/dryer, which was great as we had already been traveling. We forgot to ask him about the phone use, but he emailed instructions and it was nice calling home to the USA in the evening. We loved the nearby Indian restaurant, and got to know the grocery store folks around the corner. Would highly recommend John's place, so much nicer than a hotel!!

We stayed at the flat for 3 days, and loved it. It looks exactly like the pictures. The kitchen and bathroom are beautifully remodeled and easy and comfortable to use. It is a short walk over to the Jubilee line on the underground, and you can get anywhere (I recommend you get an Oyster card). We had an especially great time at the pubs right walking distance from the flat in Limestone and further into Wapping. Met a lot of locals, had some great food and beer, and enjoyed the walk along the waterfront. All in all, a great value for a great place. Thanks John for being so helpful. Please lets keep in touch, and I meant it when I said come visit us!!! Take care, and see you on (Hidden by Airbnb) .

My stay with Adriano, at his bright London flat, was my first through airbnb and it couldn't have been better! I stayed for four nights and will recommend this place to my friends. The flat is well connected with public transport and there are nice places to eat and drink nearby. Brixton/Lambeth are safe and pleasant areas. 
The flat itself is very comfortable and cleaner than many hostels and hotels I've stayed in during my travels through Europe. The bed is comfortable and warm, and the bathroom adequate and large. 
Both Adriano and Valerio are genuinely kind and caring people and we had some interesting conversations together. Adriano's experience in the hospitality industry shines through in his home and in his service. He even put me in contact with another host when my other accommodation plans fell through later in the week. Although it was not at all Adriano's problem he went out of his way to find me a place. 

Thank you Adriano!

We decided to book John's flat for 34 DAYS cause of the great reviews which we've always relied on whenever we travel. Here's our experience:

THE GOOD
*10 mins walk from the tube; 1 min from Tesco supermarket
*Neighborhood was very safe & quiet
*Flat was adequately clean & pretty much had everything
*Host was quick in answering queries
*Had a problem with the iron & it was replaced the ff day
*Host was nice and helpful (at first when I arrived with my husband)

THE WORSE / UNEXPECTED
I'm aware that the check out time is 10 AM since I asked John about it the night before thinking he might be there to check the flat & make sure everything is in good condition before I leave.

Was feeling sick the ff morning but decided I should clean up a bit so not to leave the flat in a dirty condition. I was by myself cause my husband left 2 weeks earlier for work.

Come 10:30 AM, I was still there but almost done packing my stuff. John arrived & continuously rang the doorbell. The moment I opened the door, he barges in, started yelling at me asking why I was still there & that it is very unacceptable. I was quite shocked the way he reacted & apologized but his anger didn't go away. He gave me 30 mins to pack everything & said something like having no choice but to throw me out.

Since I was almost done packing in the first place, I got out of the flat at 11:00 AM. When he came back, I had to tell him he is in the service business & should not treat his clients like that even when they have delayed in checking out. I admit it was my fault & he can be firm in reprimanding BUT the yelling, being verbally abusive, calling his client a "TRESPASSER" for checking out an hour late with matching hands on his waist & all up in my face was totally uncalled for. This person ironically even demanded respect after yelling at his client. I just shook my head, said whatever & turned my back to end the nightmare.

I agree he is a nice host but only if everything is going smoothly base on what I experienced. But maintaining professionalism at all times is a compulsory requirement he does not possess.

So despite of the good things, the level of unprofessionalism he displayed, how I felt very degraded & disrespected in the end ruined my entire stay. There are a lot of other good options & I strongly wouldn't recommend this one. Unless you can make sure you won't do anything to set off the host.

Adriano was a very nice host, ready to help us. The apartment was very clean, as shown on the pictures. We enjoyed the terrasse on the top of the building ! Again, I recommend this flat !!

This is a very nice flat, and we would be glad to come back sometime! Adriano is a very helpful and friendly host, and he took really good care of my husband, my self and our 3 children (age 8-11-14). The area is also perfect, with underground, shops and Brixton Village just a few walks away, still  not at all noisy from inside the flat. We stayed for 4 nights, and could have stayed longer! It is a small flat, and with bed all over the livingroom area we had to keep all our bags in the bedroom, leaving the bedroom quite a mess! For a couple, or  3 persons I would think this flat is a very good choise, of course depending on how big you want all the rooms to be. We would definitly recomend this flat to our friends.
Adriano was incredibly helpful, the flat was very close to a tube station and the Brixton market was amazing. I would recommend this flat wholeheartedly.
Fantastic apartment. Checkin with Adriano was a pleasant and easy process. Great location, right at brixton tube station. Perfect for our 3 nights in London. HIghly recommend this apartment.

Adriano was very nice and help full, the flat was very clean. Nice area a lots of shops , very close also to the tube station.
I am recommend Adriano flat to anyone who like a nice place and at a nice price too.
Valentin

Adriano was very responsive throughout the booking process and met us right on time to check in. The apartment was very clean with plenty of space and storage. Neighborhood felt safe and less than 5 minute walk to the Brixton Village full of restaurants and fresh food stalls. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

My two sisters and I stayed 4 days in Adriano's flat and we really loved it, Adriano was very kind and he took a time to explain us a little bit of Brixton, you can go anywhere from here by bus or underground it's really well connected with everything, there's a lot of stores, supermarkets, restaurants, etc. 
We really enjoyed our trip and we definitely stayed in this place again. Thank you again Adriano ;)

This is a very nice flat and Adriano is a friendly host. Everything needed is there. Good location and very easy to connect to the center of London. The Brixton Village is a dynamic place and we love it very much!

Adriano was a great host and also had a great apartment to offer! The apartment was very close to Metro as well as a range of different restaurants, supermarkets, cafes and pubs. The apartment was spotless and offered everything we needed to make our stay in London even more comfortable than expected. Adriano was very prompt and was always available to help with any questions. The apartment is definitely a gem!
Lovely little flat, really well equipped, nice and warm and in a brilliant location. Adriano was really helpful and accommodating - we really enjoyed our stay. Thank you!

Adriano is a lovely fellow and his flat is very clean and comfortable. We had a late flight which was delayed causing poor Adriano to have to wait for us until about 1.30am. He was very gracious about our late arrival, especially as he must have been very tired.

The flat is relatively spacious and very clean with everything you could want there. Living in a small village in Switzerland we found the noise a little disturbing but it wasn't really bad at all and the flat was very private.

As for Brixton, it is a very interesting area. Somewhat crazier at night but a real melting pot of cultures. Brixton Village is well worth a visit, as is the pub at the end of the street which seems a long way from Brixton Road.

Thanks Adriano.

Great flat only a 2 minute walk from the Tube station (exit 3) and with a Starbucks over the road, you really are set for a base to work from for a couple of days - fitted the bill perfectly for us. If you're flying into Heathrow, you can be chilling on the sofa within 30 minutes of collecting your baggage.

Great terrace, tonnes of restaurants nearby and fast wifi.

Couldn't have asked for more - thanks Chil!
The apartment is really nice and clean and the location is great. We really had a good stay and enjoyed London and Notting Hill. Chil is a wonderful host. We really recommend her home.
Great place to stay while visiting London. Definitely would recommend it.

We LOVED Chil's apartment. Beautiful space, fantastic location, close to main metro lines and fantastic host. The apartment was very cool, had lots of space and was lovely and clean. We didn't want to leave! While we didn't get to meet Chil, she was very easy to get a hold of and very accommodating. We haven't been able to stop raving about this apartment. Would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone looking to stay in London.

Handy location beside Portobello Road and very close to Notting hill Gate underground station. Little self contained house off a busy street but bedroom (which is tiny) was reasonably quiet. It was nice to have a kitchen & lounge which we wouldn't have had in a hotel.
The nice little upstairs balcony would be nice in the summer.
Chil was an attentive host who was quick to respond to text and emails.

Fantastic location! Chil was very helpful and great at answering queries and helping you. The apartment itself wasn't exactly what I was expecting, it was running a fine line between being bohemian/arty and being a bit like student accommodation.  It is really worth staying here for the location and the little roof terrace is a really nice place to sit and watch the world go by.  Unfortunately, there was quite a strong damp smell downstairs that put us off but on the whole we had an enjoyable experience here.
Fantastic flat, great neighbourhood and great host that gives spot on recommendations. You won't be disappointed!

Chil's charming flat was the perfect pied a terre for an active couple like my husband and I. We couldn't have asked for a better location smack bang in the middle of thriving Notting Hill with it's amazing bars and restaurants. The flat was cosy and comfortable, and had a great shower with plenty of hot water (important for tropical travelers in winter!)

Our only regret was not being able to make full use of the little terrace because of the cold weather!

We had a wonderful time and will definitely stay at Chil's when we travel through London again!

Chil's flat is in an excellent location right in the heart of Notting Hill, within easy access to the shops, Tube and buses, and of course, the very colourful Portobello Road market. It was very safe, adequately furnished and very comfortable, there was hot water at the ready, reliable Wifi, and a pretty porch to sit out in, quite unusual in my experience with holiday rentals. As landladies go, I don't think one could ask for a better one than Chil - she was friendly, responsive, and responsible, always answered my questions promptly, and in her welcome note to me, shared helpful information about her neighbourhood so that I felt at home right away, the best way to start a vacation! I would recommend Chil's flat, definitely.

Truely loved it. The location is perfect and the flat doesn't leave anything to be desired. It's comfortable, cosy and charming.. and the terrace is priceless! Our host had everything perfectly organized and was available for any query. Highly recommendable!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The apartment is ideally situated with all you could want near at hand. It's an amazing area! 
The Apartment is stunningly beautiful, and extremely well equipped. I will definitely stay in the flat again on my next visit to London & I can definitely recommend it to others.
Thank you so much, Chil!

Hi everyone! The apartmemt is very nice, comfortable and the great location ,  make it an ideal place to enjoy such nice city! Of course as soon as i return there, i will be at this apartment!  Note too that Chil is a great and kind person who is all the time on line for all! Thanks Chil!

We found the flat to be clean, located close to the underground and buses, and quite spacious.  Chil is a nice lady that really tries to make you feel at home.  Our wish list for improvements would be a new mattress (the springs are starting to come through), more space to hang your clothes (presently hooks on the back of the bedroom door & in the entrance) and a toaster.  This flat is a good price for what you get!
Great location in Notting Hill. The host was very friendly and communicated often to make sure we had a good stay.

Chil was very responsive.  She was thoughtful by leaving things which allowed you to relax on arrival without immediately searching out markets.  The Notting Hill neighborhood is great with shops, upscale markets and nice pubs and restaurants.  We found the flat warm, welcoming and comfortable.  During our two week stay, we spent many hours on our feet being tourists and the flat felt relaxing when we returned to it each evening.  One special part of the flat is the terrace and we spent as much time as possible when were at the flat. We also enjoyed Chil's art collection including the pieces she did herself.
Host was very accommodating we arrived at an ungodly hour and she agreed to let us leave our bags at apartment
Great flat and location, very clean. Easy check in and out. Thanks Chil for a great stay.

Chil's trendy/cosy flat is right in the heart of Notting Hill with Portobello Market just down the road and the tube a couple of minute's walk. Shops, a fabulous fish and chippery, cafes and a pub were less than 100 metres away. The flat was light, bright and very clean and having the fabulous terrace overlooking the street behind was a bonus even though the weather did not allow us to use it. A bottle of wine, pack of biscuits, milk, basics and helpful maps welcomed us and was a lovely surprise. The wi-fi worked well, the fantastic heating was great and the bed very comfy. Chil was very helpful and communication very easy. When we stepped out of the door and onto the street each day we felt like locals and just loved the whole atmosphere. We couldn't have wished for a better start to our 5 month trip to the UK and Europe.

We thoroughly enjoyed Chil's kind hospitality in Notting Hill.  We did not want for anything, including regular updates and responses from our host.  Just a skip from the Notting Hill tube, this charming flat is a perfect spot for exploring the area or other parts of London, or just relaxing in the midst of a dynamic neighborhood.

Chil was the best! great communication leading up to and during our stay, she responds so quickly and that is much appreciated when travelling! the apartment and location is the best, you have Notting Hill and Portobello Road literally on your doorstep, also the tube, Tesco and off licences are all close by. Lots of great pubs/bars/restaurants around - so many in fact we didn’t get to enjoy the lovely bottle of wine that Chil left for us on our arrival! The Terrace is awesome as well! Next time we travel to London we would love to stay here again.

This June we have stayed for a second time already at this apartment. It is every bit as adorable and comfortable as you see in the pictures. Chil is friendly, kind, responsive and hospitable, she made sure we had what we needed. I would not hesitate to recommend this property.
Thank you very much, Chil. Hope to stay with you again soon.
Alena and Mila

We went to London to see Monty Python live, and stayed at the apartment for five great days. As promised, the location is terrific, a minute from Notting Hill Gate tube station, and close to many pubs and restaurants. The neighborhood can be a bit crowded with tourists over the weekend but once you get inside and sit on the terrace, you feel like a local watching the crowds go by. 

Chil was a great host, and left cookies and wine for us. The kitchen is well equipped and the entire apartment is charming. The only con we can think of is that the living room can be a bit noisy, as double decker buses pass by. But despite this, we highly recommend the place.

This is a wonderful apartment and a great neighborhood.  It is convenient to the tube but is out of the crowds.  The tube is right around the corner.

Pictures and descriptions of the apartment is accurate. We had good weather and enjoyed the private patio.  It was a pleasant surprise to find that this flat is totally private and not in a shared building.  We were very comfortable.  

The wi-fi worked well, but be forewarned that if you are a TV addict, there is none.  We did not find it a problem.  There is a convenient grocery (Tasco's) just down the main road 1 block west if the Tube station on the North side of the road. Lots of restaurants, bars and movie houses in the neighborhood.

Chil left the key for us, but we did meet on the last day. We would happily stay again in a future trip.  Thanks, Chil 

Mary Jo McDonald

Chil's flat was exactly as we expected, perfect. The 1 min access to the Notting Hill Gate Tube made it easy to start and finish our days. Everything you need is within walking distance. We bought groceries at Tesco around the corner and took full advantage of the lovely terrace with a home cooked breakfast in the morning and beer/wine at night. Its a great spot to feel like a real Londoner. Walk the city, you can find tons of pubs and eateries with a mile of the flat. Booking this flat made for a perfect jumpstart to our European vacation.
Everything was fabulous....the location & the communication with Vestalia was so easy. The flat is situated close to the underground, shops etc

The flat was even better than advertised!  It is incredibly spacious and very quiet although it is right on the main street and therefore very convenient.   The terrace is a fantastic bonus!

Chil was a great host - made everything very easy, including being very responsive and thoughtful when someone stole my purse with the key to the flat in it!

Chil welcomed me early at her place which was a very much appreciated. She was warm and welcoming and when there was a little snafu, she addressed it quickly.  Unfortunately, I felt the apartment was not cleaned up to a high standard and could do with some refreshing.  Additionally, the fridge had been switched off prior to my arrival and without me realizing it, so I lost a good supply of food I had purchased for the week.  The location is exceptional if you want to explore the city.  A little noisy due to the central location so bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper.
Loved Chil's flat, the location, and amenities.  She was lovely to correspond with as well!  I have recommended the place to a friend, and would definitely return myself.
We enjoyed are stay in the Sunny Notting Hill Flat. The hostess was helpful and the area was perfect.

I do not feel the listing description was accurate. The flat is in a good location, close to the tube stop, but was a lot louder and busier than I was anticipating. Busses were running all day and it was definitely not as relaxing as we were hoping for. 

The flat was clean and it was nice to have a place to come back to, however, there wasn't anywhere to really put our things. No place to hang clothes or 'unpack' for the week. The whole point of renting the flat was so we could have a home base, but it didn't really work out like that. A hotel would have been better, especially for the price. 

Overall, I was pretty disappointed with this. Location was ok, but I was expecting a lot better based on the posting.

What a great location so close to Tube, buses and restaurants. We would have liked to spend time on the Terrace watching the passing parade however we were too busy out and about sightseeing for our 4days in London. 
Having a washing machine was a bonus. 
We didn't have the pleasure of meeting Chil all correspondence was via email and we collected the key from a local shop.
We obviously came in the same day the previous guests moved out so the note on the table re eating food in fridge and the bottle of wine was for them.  There was only "out of date" yoghurt and milk in the fridge, no wine and the two nearly empty jars of coffee in the cupboard were mouldy, luckily the tea was OK.  Needless to say we went and bought our own provisions. 
The lounge room and bedroom are not as big or bright as the photos suggest. We had to put our cases in the lounge room as the bedroom only has room for the bed which is pushed up against the wall and there is a narrow flight of stairs between the two rooms. There are a few hangers behind the door and a small 3drawer chest if drawers. The bathroom behind the bedroom was a good size with the shower over the bath. A welcome change from the showers in plastic cubicles we had experienced over the preceding 5weeks in Europe. 
On the whole the flat was clean, the cleaner had been that morning, although all the curtains could do with a wash. 
I would recommend Chil's flat for its convenience.
We had a wonderful time at this place! Location was clean, safe and convenient. Grocery store, mall and restaurants super close. Apartment had everything we needed. Will definitely be back!

John's flat was a fantastic oasis for us after a few busy days running around downtown London.  The neighbourhood is great and it's really close to the underground.  I would definitely stay at John's again.

John has this hosting thing down pat. He provided clear directions to his place from the nearest underground station which is a quick teen minutes away.

A comprehensive guidebook is included and provides some suggestions for things to do. 

The flat is well equipped and close to a shop for people to buy basic groceries.

My only issue was the bed is not the best for tall people like me but once you find the right position it was very comfortable.

I strongly recommend John's place. The location is perfect. Easy to find and easy to go and back from the center. Just 10 minutes walking from Canary Wharf station. A lovely place  where to spend an holiday!
Good location, cosy little studio. Excellent facilities.

Had a lovely week long stay at John's Canary Wharf flat. It's in a nice quiet neighborhood but within 10 minutes you have access to multiple transit options, food, and shops. It's easy and relatively quick to get anywhere in central London. The flat itself was clean, comfortable, and well equipped. John was great at communication and made the check in process a breeze! We would highly recommend this place for your stay in London.
everything was in order, lovely place ! Thanck you John !
John send us clear information about the directions and public transport. The appartment was clean and spaceious. Great neighbourhood. It was great.

A lovely little apartment. Perfect for someone who is looking to spend most of their time doing stuff in London but come back in the evening to relax and escape from the bustle. Kitchen is well stocked, the bed is very comfortable and the bathroom has been finished to a high standard.
I strongly recommend John's lovely place, it's very convenient and clean, host John is soooooo nice and he offers very prompt help for problems we had. just a little bit crowded for 3 people.

John's place was exactly what we were looking for: an inexpensive flat in a convenient part of town. It was quiet and in a removed neighborhood while still being accessible. We slept well, and coming and going was safe and easy. John was super friendly and accommodating, and we were very glad we got a chance to meet him when we were headed out.

My Husband and I stayed here for a few days. It was a very cozy flat with a usable kitchen and comfortable bed! Very accessible location to Canary Wharf underground and many nearby restaurants and shops. John was fast to communicate and provided great directions and recommendations!
Great little studio place for a few nights in Canary Wharf for one person or two at a stretch. Clean, has all amenities you need. Recommended.

Lovely small room with pull out bed. The door does open onto the road but there is such little traffic we didn't find it disturbing. John was very helpful with all his information and upfront with check in and check out. 

Only thing we might say is that because the pull out bed is on the floor it could get quite chilly but we did stay mid February so it's always going to be a little cold.

Incredibly convenient location, really close to the tube and there is a Tesco Express about 1 minute away which was so helpful. Overall we had a great stay.

This is my first time been london and I have a nice holiday. John is nice and helpful, he provide early check in and late check out to me when I request. His apartment is clean, also we just need 5 to 10 minutes to tube station. He is willing to answer any questions, I think he is the best host.
Nice place, ideal for business travel

Fantastic studio apartment that is clean, warm and a great location with close proximity to Canary Wharf.

John was an extremely helpful host and made the check-in hassle free!
Great bedsit - everything you could possibly need, perfectly clean.  A good place for working in Canary Wharf, or for a break in London.
John's place is a short walk from Canary Wharf underground, shops, restaurants, etc. Comfortable and modern flat.

John and his place made our first London trip so much easier. 10 minute walk to the tubes, quiet street, nice private apartment with street access. He gives instructions on the tubes and directions to common points of interests. No complaints! Would use again.

The flat was lovely and clean! 
The host was very communicative and helpful! I would definitely stay at John's place again and can only recommend staying at his place!
Nice place and perfect location for the business trip.

It was great staying in John's apartment! John is a superb host. It takes just a few minutes to hop on the DLR or Jubilee. The city is nearby: just 10 minutes in the metro or DLR. The apartment is cosy and clean, supermarkets nearby. CU next time John!

Very nice and cozy flat. Clever decorations. Arrived there easily via tube, instructions were clear, many nice restaurants and bars around and still the flat is in a very quiet street area. The flat was clean and smelled clean. I would recommend John's place anytime and I would return anytime.
John was really communicative and helpful with check in/out and offered excellent recommendations that I used during my stay. The flat was clean and a great place for business travel.

Affordable, Clean, convenient and well located, this apartment will suit every travelers wanted to spend some great time in London. Grocerymarket 30sec away, station 5-10min walk, near by bus stop. Highly recommended.

John's apartment was the perfect home base for my fiancee and I to explore London for 2 days.  We had just left Iceland for a week and had a relaxing two days in Canary Wharf and the surrounding areas.  The location is perfect to hop on the Underground and get anywhere in the city in a matter of minutes.  John was an amazing host and was always quick to respond to any questions we had. 
 We will definitely be back for a longer trip and look forward to staying at John's place again!
John is a great host - very friendly and easy to talk to. The place is ideal if you're looking for something outside of central London but still within short distance.

I stayed in Adriano's flat for most of a week and it turned out to be a truly memorable experience. Another guest commented on the state of the entrance and, yes, it could be improved. But once inside the flat, its a whole different story. The accommodation is airy, comfortable and modern. I used the kitchen on a number of occasions and found it well equipped, clean and efficient. The living room is sunny and bright, the bedroom quiet and cosy. All facilities (plumbing, lighting, heating, cooking, wifi, etc.) were working as expected.
I have also to say a few words about Adriano himself. I was delayed on arrival, but Adriano didn't show the least annoyance; he greeted me warmly and spent time going over all the details of the flat. As you can see from his text, Adriano's a big fan of Brixton and he encouraged me to explore its various and colourful offerings. He even accompanied me to the Brixton market to show me some of his favorite shops.
The flat is very conveniently located a few steps away from the Victoria line tube. Getting there involves wading through crowds of people that seem to continuously swarm around the Brixton tube station and adjoining market area. In spite of all this frenetic activity however, the flat being on a quiet side street is isolated from the clamour. The only noise I heard from the flat were fire crackers on the evening of my 5 November arrival : I hadn't reckoned on Guy Fawkes! The rest of my stay was quiet and very calm.
In short, I was entirely satisfied with my choice of this Brixton flat and found my host to be a most friendly, helpful and considerate person.

Everyone else has fairly accurately summed up the experience with Adriano and his lovely flat in Brixton.  Location and convenience cannot be beat.  A hop, skip and a jump from the Underground (Metro), plus access to several buslines available on the High Street makes for easy transport to just about anywhere in London. The apartment itself is clean and well organized. The kitchen is well equipped...enough for us to prepare a small Thanksgiving feast for a few friends.  The building is quiet.  The neighborhood is well appointed with stores, restaurants, and things of interest. There is plenty of heat in the apartment, it is well lite with lots of windows for getting sunlight, fresh air and a nice view of the street and outside world.  The one problem/issue is something out of Adriano's control.  The building itself and the entrance to the building is in dire need of maintenance and upkeep.  If you're familiar with British construction and maintenance techniques, you might not be too shocked because this is standard issue.   If you come to his apartment, prepare for this.  But, once inside, you will be happy. you rented

My husband and I were very pleased to be able to use Adriano's apartment while visiting relatives in Brixton.  Rather than having to stay in their small flat we were able to use this spacious and clean apartment which is so very close to the centre of Brixton.  

We were happy to find that the road is quiet - we had expected a lot of noise at night and early morning but despite being so close to Brixton High Street, it was not noisy at all. 

The beds are fine, the kitchen well-equipped and the lounge/diner was perfectly comfortable enough to be a home from home when required.  

The apartment t is fantastically conveniently situated and would be perfect for a few days in London.  Streams of buses pass the end of the road going to every part of central London and the apartment is just a couple of minutes walk from Brixton tube station which give access to Victoria and Oxford Circus in a very few minutes.  

We would be more than happy to rent this apartment again.
Nicely decorated flat close to the station, we(me and 3 friends) enjoyed the stay at the flat. Adriano was really cool as well!!

We really enjoyed our stay at Adriono's flat in Brixton. The rooms are spacious, bright and very clean with lovely furniture.
Brixton is fantastic! The amazing market, the Ritzy cinema and lots of Caribbean food. 
The flat is located in South London in zone 2 but it is easily reached by the Victoria line.

A big thanks to Adriano. We would definitely stay there again.

Regine and Jutta

It's been such a great experience to stay with Elisa & Dominic's family. They're super nice people, and so are their children. The room is cosy, and the private bathroom (very clean) is definitely a bonus! Breakfasts are thoughtfully prepared and nicely presented!! Dominic is also very helpful in addressing all our needs. I really do look forward to coming back to this welcoming home again next time in London!!!

We arrived to spend a couple of days seeing London and socialising with friends and would definately stay here again.  Elisa and Dominic are great, very laid back and accommodating.  The location is great for getting into the centre of London too.  Overall a great experience.

Tony & Steph

The stay with Elisa and her family was just perfect. Their place was easy to reach by Tube; the house is lovely; the room is cute and cosy. Elisa and her husband were incredibly helpful, giving me tips on the neighborhood. I went to the vegetarian restaurant they pointed me to for dinner and loved it. Everything was wonderful. I hope to stay with them again.

Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in London bei Elisa. Sie und Dominic waren tolle Gastgeber und haben uns jede Menge London-Tipps gegeben. Das Zimmer ist gemütlich und das Haus steht in einer ruhigen Nebenstraße. Es gibt zwei Bahn-Stationen und eine Bushaltestelle in der Nähe und man kommt problemlos überall hin. Jederzeit gern wieder!
We enjoyed our stay at Elisa's home very much! She and Dominic made us feel very welcome and gave us lots of advice on what to see and to do in London. The room is cosy and the house is well located in a quiet little street. There are two tube and a bus station nearby, so getting around is really easy. We highly recommend Elisa's BandB and would definitely stay there again!

Elisa and her family were perfect hosts and a delight to spend time with. Their home is in a great location for transport, shopping and even jogging, and the room is just as described - bright, comfy and well equipped. In general, the perfect example of why staying in someone's home is so much better than a hotel. Thanks Elisa!
The flat is in a great neighborhood! Underground access just around the corner.

Chil's flat was extremely well located in Notting Hill (itself a great neighborhood and really close to the Tube to make transport around the city easy) and was a good size for my husband and I. Chil was very responsive when there was a slight miscommunication on the way we were getting the keys to the place, which we appreciated after our long flight over! She was also great with other miscellaneous questions we had throughout the stay. Thanks, Chil!

Penny and I enjoyed our time at Notting Hill Gate. The unit was central to everything we needed.We found the unit a haven, very little noise came into the flat even thou you are sour round by roads, shops etc. thanks Chil
Great location. Next to tube station. Clean flat. Great outdoor area for sitting.

I had a fantastic stay in Chil's lovely flat, located in Notting Hill.

The flat is very centrally located and only a few minutes walk to Notting Hill tube, supermarkets and great restaurants and cafe.

Chil was very helpful and prompt when dealing with my reservation and an absolute pleasure to deal with.

I would recommend her flat to anyone looking for a comfortable stay in Notting Hill

Huge flat in a great location!  Very very close to the Notting Hill Gate tube stop.  The outdoor patio was a great place to take in the neighborhood.  

The flat itself is a split level, with a very large bathroom.  The shower had excellent water pressure!  Something I didn't realize I was missing on our trip until we got to Chil's flat.  Also, a large bed comfortable for 2 people.  

Chil was accommodating when my husband and I arrived a bit earlier than expected.  The flat was just as described.  Clean and comfortable and plenty of space.

Chil's flat is the perfect option if you want to spend a lovely and memorable  stay in London. Her appartment has all you need and more. It's stylish and confortable.
She has also left  us useful city guides and maps and a bottle of wine as act of the kindness she demonstrates in every moment.
You will feel at home in her house and into a movie when you open the door. Notting Hill with its traditional markets, stores and coffee (Website hidden by Airbnb) an unforgettable place.
Certainly, we'll choose Chil's flat in our return to London,.. and we hope it will be soon!!

We had a really nice stay in your app. we loved the neighbourhood it was just like we hoped. 
the appartement was very good and had all features that we could wish. Chil had provided us with milk, beers, wine and crackers when we arrived - very nice.

We had a great time at Chil appartment, the place is easy to find and well furnished. The neighborhood is amazing, as well as the terrasse. A  bootle of wine was even waiting for us on the table !  Eventhough we had trouble for communication at the beginning, Chil respond quickly and was a really dedicated host. Thanks for everything.
Chil was very helpful. Her place was convenient, very close to the tube station. The size was good for two people. It served us really well.

We had a wonderful experience at Chil's home. Great location, a minute from the tube, very nicely decorated and a lovely terrace. 
Chil was very nice and even let us check out late on Christmas Day.

Great flat in a great location with a very cool little terrace. We visited in winter but I am sure in summer this is real luxury! The kitchen was well equipped and our host was super helpful and responsive whenever we had a question.

What an incredible location literally in the middle of Notting Hill.  There couldn't be a better location actually, and the rooftop patio was really special as well - even though it was snowing while i was there so i didn't get to use it much!  Will definitely recommend this to friends that will be coming through there in the near future

Chil is a very responsive host. Easy to reach and always helpful. The appartment is perfectly located (2 min next to the notting hill station) and has lots of great restaurants within a short walk. 
Appartment was as described and fully equipped. Bed was comfortable, although for two tall people it could get a little bit too cozy. 
We would definitively go again to chil's place.

The flat is exactly like the photos and has great light and a good space.  The kitchen has everything and the bathroom is large for London.  Very close to the tube but the house is quiet and you are not disturbed by noise at night at all.  Over all very good flat to stay in if you want to relax at home or explore London.

Elisa & Dominic and their children were perfect hosts.  As this was our first experience using "airbnb" we were a little apprehensive but as soon as we arrived and received a warm a friendly greeting all doubts were erased.  They even carried our heavy bags up the steps for us.

The house is on a quiet street with pretty gardens front and back.  It is within 5 minutes walk from 2 Shepherds Bush tube stations and shops on Uxbridge Road.  The very swish Westfield shopping centre & restaurant area are also 5 to 10 minutes walk.

The bedroom is fresh & sunny, with a large window facing the rear garden, exactly as pictured.  The bathroom is pretty and clean with a lovely hot power shower.  Breakfast is more than we could eat, muesli, assorted cereals, yoghurt, fruit, croissants or hot cross buns, juice, tea, coffee.....all laid out in the sunny conservatory kitchen ready for us each morning.  

Elisa & Dominic wrote out a list of suggestions for places to visit as we headed off on our road trip to Devon and Cornwall.  I would have no hesitation in recommending the Williams and their charming Victorian house to anyone who wishes to stay around Shepherd's Bush / Hammersmith London.

Elisa and her husband made us feel very welcome in their home. On arrival, they helped us with our heavy cases.
After breakfast, they gave helpful suggestions on local attractions, and went out of they way to help us.

Good place to stay in London 1) perfect hosts Elisa& Dominic and  children 2) 5 min walk to nearest station and 25 minutes to Centre via tube 3) bright room with comfort bed  4) testy croissants in  the mornings 4) lovely songs of birds. Thank you for nice journey in London!!

Lovely people, comfortable, bright, light room. Private bathroom a definite plus. Thank you for the ride to the underground station on my last day and, Elisa, your coffee was not all that bad. Thank you for your kindness and willingness to help. Would definitely recommend to friends :)

A very homely place in a central location & quiet neighborhood. Elisa was very accomodating even though we arrived quite late. The room was exactly as shown & I enjoyed browsing through some of the art books on the bookshelf. Perfect for a short stay!

Working for myself, I tend to work all over the Uk and finding a place to stay that is ideal, is of prime importance to me.  I can honestly say that my 3 night stay with Elisa and her family was fantastic.  The welcome I had was second to none and Elisa's hospitality was really great.  It was as if I'd known her for years.
The house is charming and full of character.  The room is bright and airy with nice views over the gardens.  The street is quiet and close to Shepherd's Bush Market Tube so perfect for getting around.
When I return to London, I'll be coming back here for sure.

We really like our days in Elisa. Lovely family,warm and hospitable. 
The room is comfortable and bright. 
Nice place to stay in London. :)

Elisa and Dominic were fantastic hosts and we felt perfectly at home during our stay in London. The breakfast that was waiting for us each morning was incredible and our room was very comfortable and super clean. The neighbourhood was lovely as it was both quiet (on Elisa and Dominic's street) and full of life on the main drag close by. We would definitely recommend staying here and would return in a heartbeat.

Elisa (and her entire family) was a terrific host and really made us feel very welcome into her home. A breakfast was set for us everyday in the morning, and she was very generous in helping us with any questions we had (touring London, places to eat, etc.), The room was clean and neat, a very comfortable stay. Her place is also a short 5-10 min walk to the nearest underground station. Definitely recommend! Thanks Elisa!

Gary and I had a wonderful time in London and really enjoyed our stay with Elisa & Dom!  Elisa made some really great recommendations and we had a fabulous breakfast awaiting us each morning.  Also, loved the pet tortoise!!
Wonderful accomodation, great part of London and lovely people. Would definitely visit again if they would have us.

I had a great four nights at Elisa's place - the room was exactly as advertised, comfortable and convenient. Easy access to the centre of London, shops and anything else you might want! I'd encourage anyone to consider Elisa's room for their stay!

We stayed for 3 nights in this lovely room with private bathroom and enjoyed the hospitality of the hosts (and the bath!). When you are looking for a real London experience from a place in the center of London, not too far from an underground station, this is your place! We highly recommend it! The hosts were very kind and gave us some tips about what to do and when to go where. Very helpful!

Great family, great accommodation, grate location!
We've been 3 days at Elisa and Dominic house, i felt like i was at home. Nice garden, typical British style house. Elisa and Dominic were  very positive and bright people. I can definitely would visit their place again :)

Polya

We stayed here for 4 nights and we loved it! It's a beautiful, romantic room in one of the typical British houses, with a nice private bathroom. The location is good - just a few minutes walk from the subway, easy to get everywhere you want. Elisa and Dom were amazing hosts - friendly, giving us tips about where to go and what to see, preparing great breakfast and making us feel comfortable at their home.
We highly recommend this place.
Warm welcome, everything super. Very pleassant stay.

Elisa and the family were warm and welcoming, helping me in anyway they could,  I would recomend them highly to anyone coming to London.
The tube station was also within a short walk and buses went at the end of the street all the time, great location.
Thanks for the stay :)

Great experience  our first time with airbnb: everything as expected and even more. We had great hospitality from Elisa and her family: easy, comfortable and warm. Everything super, I would definitely recommend! Thanks.

This was a great introduction to the airbnb experience. The room was as described with a very comfy bed and clean bathroom. The  breakfast was a delicious way to start our day. Our hosts were excellent, very friendly and helpful. Was a pleasure to meet them and stay in their home.

We would highly recommend staying here for a wonderful experience meeting an engaging couple who offer warm hospitality.  Our room was bright and cheery and convenient to transportation.  Many ethnic restaurants in the area.  We got great suggestions from our hosts for places to visit.  Nancy and Ken

I was fascinated by the place. House is cozy and convenient. You use your own bathroom decorated splendidly with pictures and flowers. The room is bright and clean. You can watch television or relax in the atmosphere of an English home. Hosts are very friendly and ready to help you. You enjoy the breakfast with hot croissants, milk, and delicious homemade raspberry jam. The only minus is that you have to climb some steps, but it would be a problem to very old or disabled people.

Very accommodating hosts and warmly welcomed from first moment. Nice home: Room and own bathroom as described: good power shower and house has good central heating.
Elisa and Dom helpful with all queries: Dom even met up with me in mobile phone shop to guide me through purchasing process. Well located with buses and underground within easy access. Great shopping centre nearby.
Would recommend to others

Elisa and Dom were great hosts, very friendly and helpful with tips on where to eat, what to visit, metro passes etc.   We loved the area we stayed in and Elisa and Dom's house is in a lovely street in great neighbourhood.  They made us feel very welcome in their home.

My son and myself had a very very good time at Elisa's family place. We felt like being at home. They always took the time to talk with us and to give some great ideas about places to see in London.
