I certainly reccommand their lovely house and nice family. It is also very practical with the transportation to be right in the center. I hope to be able to come back for my next time in London.

Me and my boyfriend spend a week end in Elisa's home: they provided us everything, from breakfast to towels, and even useful tips to discover London. Their house is warm and cosy: the room is beautiful and you've got also access to a private bathroom. Elisa's home is near to the centre of London, 10 minutes walk or 2 bus stops from underground. We enjoy our stay and we definetely recommend it.

for comfort and cleanliness this place was fantastic. it's a ten out of ten. you get your own bathroom too which was great! and yes, a great power shower. elisa and dom are very nice, friendly people. the walk to shephards bush tube station was less than i thought - under 10 mins. and from there its around 10 minutes to central london depending where you stop. there are lots of shops on the main road near the house. my only concern which i felt i should share was the internet connection which was slow and kept cutting off. but having said that, Dom was promptly on the phone to the phone company to sort out the issue after i told him. so it shoud be fixed by now but please check with them yourself if getting online regularly is extremely important to you.

Highly recommended! Will be hard go find a better pair of hosts out there so book with confidence!

House: As described. Clean, bright and very homely. Close to anything you might need. The house is so warm in every sense of the word and the breakfasts were yummy (and healthy)  :D

Hosts: Elisa & Dominic and their kids were lovely! We had great chats over tea and coffee about the local area(s), our families, etc.

Not only was Elisa kind enough to accept my last minute reservation request. She also made sure someone was there to meet me even after I was delayed in checking in by about an hour (sorry again about that!). 

But what was truly above and beyond was Elisa and Dom's advice and offer to help me find more permanent accommodation in London. A selfless act that I can't thank them enough for.

The room was very clean, warm and the bathroom was right next to the bedroom. The hosts were very friendly, helpful and accomodating. I would definately reccomend this place and nearly forgot to mention that the breakfast was great.

Adriano is an extremely friendly host. The apartment was perfect for me and my friends and we had a great weekend thanks to that. The apartment is spacious, modern, quiet and very clean, with everything we needed. I highly recommended Adriano to anyone!!

Adriano is a warm and welcoming host and we thoroughly enjoyed staying in his delightful  Brixton flat; he met us to give us the keys & show us round. The flat is in a great location, both for Brixton itself and London more generally. If you enjoy the buzz of South London, I would not hesitate to recommend it, we hope to stay again in the not too distant future.

Had a great week at the flat, close to the tube, and I can recommend the Trinity pub at the top of the road. Flat was very clean and all the amenities you could wish for. Adriano is an excellent host and I would not hesitate to stay their again.

Adrianos flat lies in an exciting and interesting area. The flat has everything what one needs and is just as described. You reach all highlights from London shortly by the underground which is around the corner. Adriano is a very reliable and likeable host. If we come back to London, then certainly again here.

I booked this flat for my parents while they were visiting London so they'd have their own little base for exploring the city. Adriano's flat was really great and true to the pictures on the listing. It had everything that two people needed to be self sufficient and was an excellent alternative to booking a hotel room. Being a stone's throw from the Victoria Line was really handy, and Brixton is always buzzing so location was great. Would definitely consider booking again next time I have family or friends in town.

The flat is perfect for a stay in London: very well located with a tube station just around the corner and not far from the centre. The apartment itself is spacious, bright and nicely decorated - like on the pictures - and it has everything you need, especially the kitchen is very well equipped. You find several supermarkets within walking distance and Brixton is a dynamic area that is definitely worth exploring. The terrace is a really nice spot also to relax after walking all day in the city. I really recommend this flat! Thank you, Adriano!
Great host! Apartment was perfect, great location near tube. Spot on

My husband and two boys spent five nights at Adriano's flat in Brixton in  July 2014. The location of the flat is very conveniently located and easy to walk to from the Brixton tube station, railway station or bus-stop. We found nearby Brixton Village to be the best place to find dinner, and there were many convenience stores nearby so we could easily fill our fridge with snacks and breakfast food. The kitchen was well-equipped, and the flat itself was very clean and contemporary; everything seemed new, comfortable and stylish. I was really glad to be able to do a load of laundry - a washing machine is discreetly tucked into the kitchen. Communication with Adriano was easy and he quickly responded to my emails and texts. He's very friendly, professional and organized. He gave us a quick tour of the flat and some tips about the neighbourhood and then left us to begin our adventures in London. We would definitely stay here again. Thank-you!

Adriano was a warm and friendly host. He was quick to answer any questions prior to arrival and his flat was as promised. It was very clean and nice and bright. Both beds were comfortable and the shower had excellent pressure! (very nice when travelling!) My friend and I enjoyed our stay and I would recommend Adriano if Brixton is your destination!
The best thing about the flat is the location - absolutely great! The host was charismatic and the flat has everything you need. Recommended!

Adriano was available even though we were late.
The reception was nice and Adriano explained us what we needed to know.
The flat fits the description and everything is in perfect condition.
The emplacement is cool and useful to visit london.

Adriano was already waiting for us when we arrived at the flat. He was very friendly and helpful. The flat was cozy and warm, and had all the comforts we needed. It was very clean. It has a smart TV with internet, which was very useful. The location was excellent and very convenient - lots of shops nearby and most important it was near the tube station. I definitely recommend staying here. Adriano is a great host and goes out of his way to help you. Once we were locked out and he came right away to let us in!
I had a very nice stay! Clean, charming and comfortable. The hosts were also very kind and helpful.
Great flat, fantastic location, wonderful host.
Lovely place really near to Brixton Tube. Adriano wasn't in the country but made it very easy to check in and out all the same. Would stay again no problem.

Fanstastic flat.
1. Good location : easy access to go everywhere in London so much bus around and so close to underground and train , so much good restaurant around i took away everyday best caribbean restaurant around thr cornor 

2. Very comfotable : you can find everything you want in flat. Fast wifi comfatable sofa and bed,  Washing machine also they provide soap powder for clothes and basic things for cook (olive oil, salt, pepper etc) of course many dishes and pan and microwave. 

3. Nice person : adriano who helps me to get in he is so nice person and reliable so i could stay with relax mind. Thats very important to me to find myself comfotable in new city. 

Thanks a lot for everything. I hope i can stay yours next time again. 

All the best

Flat was fine but over-priced. Don't know where the 20% off bit comes in - we paid the premium. Bit cramped for four people. And a bit Brixton-shabby. But the flat itself is clean and bright and ultimately, we enjoyed ourselves.

We could nog place our bags in the flat earlier than 14.00 hrs, which would have been a nice service, since we arrived with an early flight. Adriano explained well how to use the flat, a bit hasty and not so personal, but it was OK. The flat is very small if you are with 4 persons, two really small rooms. But the bathroom is big and the shower is great. The kitchen is OK too. We were not happy with the blinds, they were broken everywhere so you could not pull them up during the day (no view) and the rooms were not dark enough during the time yo want to sleep. Brixton is very nice though, we had a good time. But Adriano; the place is not so cheep so see to the blinds please!

This flat was perfect for my needs and was very clean and located very close to my are of business for my stay in Brixton. Adriano was very pleasant and a pleasure to deal with. I highly recommend this flat as an option for a stay in a bustling part of London.
The flat was clean and pleasant, and peaceful though close to the lively Brixton town centre. This was much appreciated by the friends for whom I booked.

We were so looking forward to meeting Adriano and staying at this cool location but on the day I was to fly I had my appendix removed so was unable to do either. I would love to stay at his home and meet him as he was always there and replied immediately. Oh dear, never mind there is always next year!

Adriano is a really nice guy and very accommodating. He worked around my schedule for check in as I worked late on the day. The flat is maybe 2mins walk from brixton tube and everything you need is near by. The flat is pretty small but is fine for two people max not 3. The kitchen and bathroom have everything you need and are nice and clean. It says there is a TV but it doesn't have free view or cable so you can only use the apps. That's fine if you have Netflix or happy watching YouTube and bbc iplayer. The bedroom could do with a really good clean, the bed was comfortable but the room felt very wore to the rest of the flat. The walls seems to be super thin so you can hear people talk and taking showers in the morning. Someone was smoking in the hall and it felt like they were smoking in my face. The flat was nice but with these little issues I felt it was a bit over priced. Flats in the area are going for around the same price but have a little more TLC. How ever these issues may not bother others
Adriano was a great host. Made us feel right at home and the apartment was spot on. Lovely roof terrace to soak up the sun!
Adriano is a most delightful person. We met him and he showed us how every thing worked. So gorgeous and happy

We were unable to attend at the last minute and I contacted Elisa's husband to let them know.  They were very sorry that we were able to visit and suggested to get in touch next time we are in London and they may be able to help.  Elisa has responded to every question within hours and was very helpful throughout.  We were very disappointed not to be able to stay.

Don't pass this one up! Elisa, Dominic, and their family were extremely friendly and attentive and we are extremely thankful they considered us as guests, especially the week before Christmas! The house is very charming and the room has pretty much everything you need, not to mention that it is also very well kept and you get your own bathroom (a plus, since most of the other options we looked into had shared ones)! It wasn't at all difficult to locate from Heathrow or the city center and it only took a short walk to reach all public transport. We didn't explore the neighborhood very much, however there are several places to eat nearby. Breakfast was also provided, and, just as everyone else has mentioned, it was very good! Definitely a great place to stay if you're looking for something less restrictive than a hotel, but just as private!

Staying with the Williams Family was a great pleasure. The room and the house are both soo qute, warm and comfortable. When our shower didn't work, Dom handled that immediately and let us using theirs. Especially we enjoined the talk with Elisa and Dom who supported us with advices about public transport and sightseeing stuff. I would stay with them again anytime, and hope to do so some day.
Very nice experience, the house is cozy, the room is nice and clean!We recommend it!

I recommend this to anyone looking for a nice, comfortable, and easily accessible place to stay in (Website hidden by Airbnb) host Elisa and her family were wonderful.Next time I come I hope to stay with them again.I gave it four out of five because of dodgy internet access, not fault to them, but it was needed.Although there are plenty of places which offer internet service in the area including the nearby library.
It was a great stay! Elisa was a great host and the room was very comfy. Unfortunately the wifi was down, hence 4 stars.

We arrived at the Williams on Sunday and were welcomed by both Elisa & Dominic (Dom) with warm tea and good conversation. They were both very hospitable and it felt so homely... Their kids were also very friendly and were always helpful. Morning breakfast was lovely and we also had the chance of meeting with the family pet (tortiese).. "Telula".. :) 

Again, we would stay here on our next visit... that's for sure. The location is so ideal with all the facilities being just around the corner... literaly!! 

And the William's household definately adds to the comfort. 

Thanks - Dom, Elisa, Columba & Arthur, we had a wonderful stay. :) 

Cheers.

Elisa and husband Dominic were lovely hosts.  They lead busy lives but had time to share with us and advise about things to do, places to visit which led us to the Borough Market in Southwark - wonderful food there.  We felt very welcome sharing their kitchen space and chatting.

The instructions on how to find their place very clear and we had no problems.  Communication was always good.  Room was cute and warm and bed comfortable.

Elisa's place was very nice and certainly a home.  The continental breakfasts were great, with homemade jam even!  The bathroom was nice.  Everything was neat and clean.  We would surely recommend this to others staying in London.  It is pretty centrally located and close to multiple underground stations.

We were greeted with a warm welcome and a cup of tea in their lovely warm sunny kitchen/dining area. Our bedroom was warm and sunny, with a comfy bed and ample wardrobe/ drawer space. Bedroom and bathroom were both very clean and tastefully decorated.
The breakfast was yummy with homemade spreads and nice cereals and crossiants. It was nice to make our own coffee/tea and toasts and eat breakfast at our leisure. The family pet tortoise was the highlight of the morning. The selection of tourist info brochures in the room was helpful and Elisa and Dom were both happy to offer suggestions of places to go and see.
Would definely love to stay again if we are ever in London again.
Elisa and Dom were wonderful hosts during our stay.  the house was in a perfect location for visiting London and there were many restaurants around the corner for dinner after a long day of walking.

Wooooow! What a nice place! Superb! Lovely house & room, family atmo, this is the place to be in London! Dont miss breakfast, its delicious... :-) Thanks to Elisa and Dom, this was a perfect weekend-trip, hope to see you again!

Excellent place! Accommodation in Elisa’s house was absolutely great. Exactly matches the description. We felt there like at home. Elisa is very friendly and helpful. Thanks to her, our trip to London was even better than we expected.

My husband and I spent 2 nights at Elisa's. It was indeed an awesome experience to stay in her house. She is such a lovely host. Breakfast is provided as well. We intended to extend another night but unfortunately her room is taken. However, she was kind enough to check with her neighbor who is just a street behind from her house to ensure we are have accommodation for one more night. We have a lot of privacy, bathroom is just beside the room, hair dryer is provided too. WIFI speed is good enough! All in all no regret to have home stay during our trip to London!! Thanks Elisa for your warmest hospitality!

Brixton was great.  Loved the location of the flat.  Happy that the bedroom was at the back because the street in front of the house can be quite noisy.  We had to adjust the shower temperature at the water heater in the kitchen because the cold water isn't working in the bath - a bit awkward to run back and forth (Adriano said the council had turned it off).

Great experience with Adriano. Went out of his way to help accommodate our check in time. Great flat. Clean, tidy, all required amenities and as described.  Local area is vibrant with friendly and interesting locals!
The place was very clean, great location. Adriano was very prompt and helpful. A very good experience
Really nice flat in a great location right next to Brixton Market. Adriano was easy to communicate with and replied to all messages instantly. I would definitely stay in his flat again !
Adriano is a very nice guy who looks good after his guests. The flat was clean and everything we needed was there. Would be nice to go there again. Thanks for everything!
Great location, nice apartment,clean and quiet.
This flat is well cared for, cozy, very clean and fully equipped. Communication was smooth and easy.  I am sure you will enjoy this choice.
A home away from home. Lovely spacious and well lit flat, perfect location. Great and responsive host - thanks for having us! We will be back
The place was convenient and Adriano was very nice and very responsive. It wasn't as clean and sparkly as the pictures, but it was fine enough for the time we stayed.
Adriano's place was in a great location, really super close to Brixton tube station and only a short train ride to central London. It was well furnished and clean

Brixton is a busy and vibrant community so it was a pleasure to be in and about the streets. The downside was that it could get too busy but many would not consider that a bad thing. Adriano was always pleasant and quick to remedy any problems that ocurred. 
The flat was a little smaller than expected but otherwise comfortable and easy to manage.

The flat was so much better than expected! Bright and clean, very cozy and like home. Adriano did everything in his power to fix tiny issues coming up with our light, he was extremely friendly and helpful. The area is very safe and quiet, although it's only a few seconds away from Brixton central. There is so much to do and so much to see, amazing restaurants and the cutest cinema.
Definitely recommend it to anyone!

Very good choice for a visit to London and Brixton. Perfect location, close to underground, buses, restaurants and bars. Only 10 minutes to Oxford Circus with the underground.
The living room is bright with big windows, and the apartment suited us two very well. It was also warm and nice (some London apartments are quite cold).
The only negative is that the cleaning could have been a bit better, surfaces like floors, tables etc were ok, but a more thorough housecleaning would be good.
Brixton is a very nice part of London, with interesting restaurants and bars, especially the arcades with shops and restaurants, Brixton Brewery and POP Brixton, a market area created with containers.
We would like to stay here again.
Great place great location and great host! Adriano was so helpful in getting us set-up in his wonderful Brixton flat!

We enjoyed our stay at Adriano's place. The flat is very well situated being less than 5 minutes to the tube and very close Brixton academy and a variety of decent pubs of which Adriano gave us directions to. 
The flat itself was as expected and was perfect for all our needs - we felt very comfortable during our stay.

Adrianos place was clean, comfy and had everything i needed for my stay! it was perfect for one person or a couple, right in the centre of Brixton and only 2 mins walk to the tube, surrounded by loads of bars and restaurants. Would definitely recommend and would stay again! Thanks Adriano!

Elisa's house is located in a very dynamic area there are many interesting places nearby to explore. The house itself is in a very quiet street- i was amazed how quiet it was while it is in fact very central in that area - a lots of nice fruit & Veg shops and five mins walk to the tube station....
The bed room is lovely and cosy, having your own bathroom is just so nice! Elisa, Dominic and their children are very warm and welcoming you feel so looked after but also have your own space. highly recommend and  I will definitely stay there again!

We spent a great, lovely weekend here in a really friendly, family-like atmosphere. Elisa and Dom are very helpful, thank you for having us! The apartment has excellent location and transport, and the breakfast is delicius. Recommended for everyone!

I would definitely recommend this room. It is cosy, clean and warm and the bathroom has an amazing bath. Elisa is a great host and made me feel welcome and at ease in her house.
The nearest tube station is less than 5 minutes away; the area is lively and there are loads of restaurants and cafés just round the corner.
I will definitely book this room again for my next stay in London!
Great host, nice place, all as mentioned! Thank you, Elisa!
Excellent location, great hosts very nice and welcoming, we had a very good time at their place. We would advice it to anyone.
We felt very much at home. Elisa and her husband are perfect hosts and we had some very interesting conversations so we really recommend this place.

We had a lovely stay! The house was only a couple of minutes from the tube station and really easy to find. The Bedroom was clean and fresh. On our last morning we were greeted by the pet tortoise which we loved!

I enjoyed a comfortable 4 day stay at Elisa's. She was very helpful and friendly. The bedroom was up three flights of stairs, could be a bit tricky for someone with a heavy suitcase to lug upstairs. I had my own private bathroom which was a bonus. Breakfast consisted of cereals, yoghurt, croissant, jam and tea or coffee which was left on kitchen table to help myself. I was on my own most of the time as family left fairly early each morning. I was given a key to come and go as I pleased. 
As a solo female traveller I found the area and surrounds to be safe walking late in the night of which I did and felt safe at all times.
House is situated in quiet street off Uxbridge Road. About a 10 min walk to Shepherds Bush station which is on the Central Line and Westfield Shopping centre. Not to be confused Shepherds Bush Market station is closer, about a 5 min walk from house.
On a different note, I found the wifi did not work very well in my room...kept cutting out especially late at night and could not connect...very frustrating! 
I would recommend Elisa's for location, comfort, friendliness, affordability and helpfulness.

Elisa was great.  We had different arrival times and Elisa was very accommodating in making arrangements.  Elisa and her children were very welcoming into their home and extremely helpful in providing directions.  I would recommed staying with Elisa to everyone and the location is great for getting around while being up in London.

We spent four wonderful days in London. Elisa is very friendly and helpful. She welcomed us with a cup of tea and some biscuits. In the following days she also gave us some helpful advice and suggestions. Her house is very nice, the street is close to the main street with lots of shops and restaurants and only a five minute walk from a tube station but it is very quiet. We will definitely book this room again if we return to London. Laura and Renzo

I didn't get to stay with ELISA as there was error with double booking . ELISA organised for me to stay with friend in lively house in fabulous location. Friend was very welcoming and really enjoyed my stay.

Dom's warm welcome at the front door set the scene for a very comfortable and enjoyable stay with Elisa and Dom. This was a family home, where breakfast was available in the warm family kitchen, where we would often catch up with Dom or Elisa for an early morning chat.  Our room was clean,comfortable and warm and adjacent to a private bathroom.   Transport into London was easy with bus stops close by and rail stations a short walk away. We found a couple of good restaurants nearby, and there were plenty of supermarkets and greengrocers within 10 mins walk.  it was also easy to travel to/from Heathrow by train/bus. A good base, in a comfortable home close to London.

We were at Elisa's home with my wife. The location is a little far from some attractions, but the tube stations and bus stops are very close to the house. The neighbourhood is safe. There is a bar at the corner and sometimes we found people outside it chatting on the street, but at the end it was no problem for anyone.

The room was lovely decorated and kept the warmth of the day. You can feel it when you get there at the end of the day and it was very good for us. The view to to the garden and the backyard was awesome!

The private bathroom was very good, comfortable and spacious and , as the whole house, very well decorated.

The breakfast was great! Croissants, various jams,orange or apple juice, fruit, tea or coffee, yoghurt and cereals.

We felt really like at home. Elisa and Dom were excellent hosts and their beautiful family was very helpful and cordial.

We highly recommend Elisa's house for everyone!

We had a really good time at Elisas. The room and the bathroom were nice and clean. We could come and go whenever we wanted and the whole family was very welcoming. It's a great place to stay in London!!!

I have only met Elisa and 2 of her daughters and they are such friendly hosts.
The room and bathroom on the 3rd floor were clean and bed was comfortable. Elisa had kindly set up the breakfast table every morning for us and made effort to tweak the breakfast menu a little everyday. The surrounding area is peaceful at night. And the bnb is located about 20min walk from Westfield (a shopping mall) which has many wonderful restaurants and awesome for the shopaholics. Westfield also has a huge supermarket, Waitrose.
It was a pleasant stay. Thank you Elisa!

The house was a nice, big, busy, family home.The room was exactly as described. Very pleasant and comfy; lovely bed; feather duvet cover and feather pillows. All clean. I slept well. Welcoming family. Elisa was away when I went but her adult daughters looked after me. They were very friendly. I felt comfortable to use the kitchen and other rooms. The area is very interesting; bustling and multi-cultural. I arrived on my bike and used it to get around. 10 mins ride to Kensigton or to Hyde park. There is a private space in the front garden to lock a bike up, so that was easy. I would recommend the Hummingbird Cafe restaurant/cafe just along the road. I would recommend Elisas home

Elisa and Dom were very hospitable, and provided good instructions on how to find their place.  Our room was not large, on the third floor, up narrow stairs, but we had our own bathroom with shower/bath and toilet, and the bed was comfortable.. Elisa had the table set every morning for breakfast - and it was lovely. We were not bothered by noise form the house or neighbours. 

There are an abundance of eating places just a couple of minutes walk down the street, which is the most multicultural street we'd seen.  Only 15 minutes walk is the "Westfiled Shopping Centre in Shepherds Bush. 

Since we used public transport we had no trouble parking on a crowded street.  Ten minutes walk reaches Shepherds Bush Market Tube Station and 15 reaches Shepherds Bush Tube Station.

Elisa allowed us to leave our luggage on our last day until afternoon when we collected it on our way to the airport.


We'd have no problem staying again with Elisa and Dom if we were to re-visit London.
Chil made me feel welcome by accommodating me by arriving late at night

My wife and I enjoyed our stay very much.  The property is very well located with access to the Underground and other London points of interest.  Both Chil and her husband were available for logistical questions on short notice, which was very helpful.

Adriano's flat is a nice, bright accommodation. It offers a fair value for the area. It's steps from the Tube (on the 24/7 Victoria line!) and adjacent to a vibrant, dynamic market spanning several blocks.  The flat itself offers a living space with large windows, a full scale kitchen, generous bath and quaint bedroom. 

If you want to stay like a local in a vibrant, active South London neighborhood, head to Brixton and stay at Adriano's place!

Elisa's B'n'B room is a very cozy and pleasant place. My wife and I enjoyed our stay very much. I would definitely stay there again if I am visiting London. Clean room, fantastic hosts and great location.

Elisa was a wonderful, friendly and laid back host. We really appreciated her accommodating us at such short notice, she really did save our trip to London. We loved the laid back arrangements for checking in and checking out which made the whole experience very relaxing and meant we didn't need to rush straight off in the morning. Although the night was very warm and we didn't have the best of sleep, Elisa made every effort to ensure our room was kept cool, and the bed was very comfortable.  The house itself is located literally 5 minutes away from Shepards bush market (within zone 2) which gets to you places like kings cross within 20 minutes which is ideal. The room and private bathroom we're a perfect size for a couple and we're made very private by having your own floor of the house. Breakfast  was waiting for us in the morning which was a lovely surprise, as was discovering the pet tortoise which was amazing! Overall a lovely Airbnb experience, I would recommend Elisa's house to anybody visiting London and really hope we are able to visit again soon! Thank you again for a lovely stay. Abigail & Jonathon

Elisa and Dom are perfect hosts. Friendly, hospitable and helpful.The room and bathroom was nice and clean. We loved to stay at the house with the family. Having breakfast in the big family kitchen was great. Thank you so much, Sandra & Oliver

We loved our stay with ELISA & her family , they are all so warm and friendly .
We had a great breakfast left out for us each morning and we have to thank Dom for giving us at leave other next destination.
Thank you so much for all you help ELISA and Dom  !!!
Elisa was a very knowledgeable and helpful host. Comfortable bed, hot shower and great location with easy public transportation; also, the healthy breakfast is a thumbs up!

My parents stayed here while they were in London and they enjoyed Elisa's hospitality. My mum especially, loved the place cause it's really near to the shopping area. And it's also easy to get around.
Elisa was a fantastic host! Great and convenient location, private room, good breakfast and coffee in the morning. I highly suggest taking a yoga class from her as well! :)

Elisa and her family thank you very much! All was so perfect, we never need something to disturb the hosts! They are very hospitable, clean and helpful and we had very much privacy! I would stay again! The house is as in the photo and the location is very good.  Elisa thank you very much for your suggestion for Greenwich! Thank you all! If only we have days to stay more, it was a great experience! Maybe next time!

Lovely place and lovely hostess. Really charming room. Was there 2 nights with my 6 years old daughter. Every morning a nice breakfast was waiting on the kitchen table.
Also very convenient by bus or tube to the city centre. Highly recommended.

I absolutely agree with the many guests of Elisa who already have described how friendly & helpful she is and how nice & cosy the room (and the whole house) is. I only might add, that her daughters and husband are very amiable and charming as well. Everybody gave me the feeling that I was really welcomed, which made my first experience with airbnb incredibly wonderful. Thank you for all, Elisa & family!

Our stay at Elisas was wonderful. 
The location is very good to explore London.
The room/house is in a quiet side street, 5 minutes walk from Shepards Bush Market Underground.
The bed was very comfortable and the private bathroom had a good size. 
The hosts were very friendly and welcoming.

So all in all a very good choice!
A really relaxing stay in a beautiful home and great London location. Many thanks to Elisa for making us so welcome and our stay so peaceful.
Elisa has a lovely house, very cozy, we had a wonderful time. Thanks !

We had a very good time at Elisa and family's home. The bedroom is very nice and clean. it was enjoyable to have our own bathroom. The house is very well located. It was our first time with Airb'n'b and we are very happy! Thank you again Elisa!
Great place to stay !

House of Elisa is just beautiful and cosy. The room was spacious, the bed was perfect! Although our flight was delayed, her husband was waiting for us with a smile :). The house is located 5 min to metro. I really advise you to visit Elisa - my boyfriend said that next time when we go to London we will ask Elisa to be hosted again.

We really enjoyed our stay in this charming place. Location was unbeatable for our purposes. The flat is well equipped and has great atmosphere. Only thing is that it can get a little noisy in there as the bus service is pretty busy in this street. It is nice and quiet in the bedroom though.
Chil provided very clear directions on how to enter the flat. The location was ideal for what we wanted on this trip. Agree with prior guests that noted the noise level off the street.
Great location! Close to subway and Portobello Market. Chil was easily reachable and very helpful.

Chil's apartment was everything we were hoping for. Everything was extremely comfortable and as advertised on the main site. The instructions Chil left for the apartment were easy to follow and the location was superb. I would highly recommend staying there while visiting London.
It was great time in london. The location was perfect and there is everything what i want and need. Thank you.
I stayed for 3 nights. The flat was clean and spacious. Very close to underground. The host was so helpful. I accidentally left my passport and the host reacted promptly. Worth another stay.

Greatest location, lovely flat with everything one needs for a stay! We got lucky with the weather and could use the cosy terrace! The flat is perfect, we would have liked a TV but since everything is just around the corner we saw a movie 3 min from our door step instead! 
Thank you Chil for this lovely stay!
Barbara
Great apartment in a great location with bus and tube station around the corner. Would highly recommend this listing to all.

We stayed for 3 nights. The appartement was claean and cosy. Great to sit on the balcony after a long walk. The location is great with Notting Hill gate underground very close and you have everything else you need just outside the doorstep, and just a short walk to Hyde park. It was easy to collect the key and find the appartment with the directions we got from Chil.
Location was excellent, and the small terrace off the flat an added pleasure. Spacious living area, clean, well equipped kitchen, quite for sleeping, communication with hostess excellent.

Dear Airbnb team!
The experience with Chil's flat was the most awfull we had in the last 15 years.
Firstly, the flat is very noisy, being situated at a crossroads very near Nottinghill Gate. Many bus lines have stations in the immediate vicinity - their (starting and other) noises surround the appartment and are audible very well inside (day and most of night), and on the terrace. In our opinion, the terrace is unusable because of the noise and the bad air, and not situated in a courtyard and has no patio situation, as Airbnb fotos suggest.
Secondly, the appartment's bedroom is very small (2 times 2.3 meters) - the only window in it is closed/barred. Thus, there is not enough air in the room for two persons, and ventilation is impossible (see details below). One side of the bed lengthens the wall, the window and a curtain. That is, the person sleeping wallside has to be habituated to such a position, and is not able to leave the bed without massively disturbing the other.
Thirdly, it is almost impossible to ventilate the rooms. There are four windows. Two (bedroom, bath) are closed/barred, the one in the bathroom having a very noisy ventilator which is about 1 meter from the head end of the bed, and is connected to a light. So it is impossible to let it run during night in order to ventilate the bedroom indirectly. Two windows may be opened but are going into the street where cars and busses pass by without interruption, day and night.
Forthly, the appartment is not clean at all - one may see it everywhere. Moreover and most importantly, on the whole it has a humid atmosphere and smells musty (the mildew is behind the boiler in the kitchen). After we had taken a shower, we used the provided towels - they smelled horribly and never again became dry. We were really in sorrow about the musty air and afraid of our health - we left after one day and two nights (we booked 6 nights) and changed to a nearby hotel.
Fifthly, the appartment is much smaller than the fotos on Airbnb suggest. There is so few space left and no armoire, and thus it was impossible to unpack the luggage.
Sixthly. Airbnb and Chil suggest a personal or private way of travelling. We never saw Chil, the bottle of welcome wine promised in Chil's letter on the table was nowhere etc.  - the appartment looked not as if persons other than tourists ever live in it.
In sum: Not cosy, not charming, not clean, no private home, almost the contrary of what is advertised on Airbnb, far too much expensive. For us a fake, almost a fraud. Our fotos are available - they do not correspond well with those on Airbnb. Our fault was probably that we were unable to look behind the fotos and to read between the lines.
With greetings from two quinquagenarians living in Vienna
The appartment is very well located near underground station and many shops. We even could enjoy the sun on the terrace. The communication with our host was really easy. We definitely recommend it.

Had a wonderful time in Chil's flat! Apartment was clean and spacious for two people, and very convenient to the notting hill gate tube station.  Plenty of great food in the area too that could be enjoyed in the flat on the balcony.  Key pick up and drop off was clear and the directions in the flat were very helpful.  Thanks Chil for giving us a wonderful place to stay while in London!

Great location, so close to the underground at Notting Hill Gate and great for walking around the local neighbourhood too, or further on to the city via Hyde Park.

The apartment is mostly as per the photos. My main disappointment was the terrace is rather exposed and less pleasant than I had hoped from the photos.

I arrived slightly early due to making it through Heathrow quicker than I expected and was met by the cleaner after a short wait. I found the apartment hadn't been cleaned and so the cleaner went to work while I waited, which was a shame as I was exhausted after 24 hours of travel to get there and just wanted to shower and sleep.

Unfortunately on the first night there was a continuous loud alarm noise near the bedroom from around 11pm until 7:00am the next morning that made it almost impossible to sleep. This alarm wasn't from the apartment itself and Chil was very quick to respond once I contacted her. I think was a strange one-off occurrence and it didn't happen again for me and I am sure can't be a regular thing or others would have surely mentioned it.

I enjoyed the light interior and art works and also loved the location and private entry door straight off the street. The bathroom is showing its age in the tile grout, toilet seat etc. Bedroom was adequate; would have been a challenge with a 2nd guest due to the location of the bed against the wall. Also the room wasn't big enough for me to open my (large) suitcase and the bedroom door at the same time.

Overall, and especially if I ignore the noisy alarm night, I enjoyed my stay here.

Chil's apartment is well located in Notting Hill, closed to Portebello Market. It is also very closed to Notting Hill Gate subway station as well as many bus stops so it is very easy and quick to go everywhere in London, in particular to touristic locations. However, you may prefer to have a short walk to Hyde Park and Kensington Palace… The apartment is bright with a large living room and a very nice terrace. Chil is available if needed. All is fine in the apartment. Great days in London!
We had a wonderful stay at Chil's lovely apartment. The location is amazing, right in the heart of Notting hill. We loved the terrace too!

My wife and I stayed at Chil's Notting Hill flat for a week. Everything was great!  Chil was out of town so the housekeeper Maria met us with keys (right on time!). The flat is RIGHT in the center of Notting Hill, which was awesome - 1 block from the tube.  The bedroom does not face the busy streets directly and was surprisingly quiet despite the hubbub from the street going by at night.
On the last day when my wife accidentally left her purse in the flat when we locked up. Chil was out of town, but responded quickly and Maria (bless her heart) saved us and made a special trip to come let us in. We would definitely book again!

we spent a lovely few days in Chil's apartment. The weather was perfect and we got  spend some time on the roof top terrace. The apartment is centrally located in the middle of everything and  hence there is traffic noise. But less so in the bedroom than in the living room. The apartment is well kept and has nice kitchen ware. We also liked the artwork a lot! The place is perfect if you want to immerse yourself in the buzz of the city for a few days.

We stayed at Chil's charming flat in Pembroke Road in Nottinghill Gate. It is the perfect location for easy transport and getting to amazing tourist spots such as Kensington Gardens and the famous Potrtabello Road markets. 

The roof terrace is an added bonus as the weather was beautiful and we could entertain guests.

Jamie Oliver's restaurant is 2 minutes walk as are local shops and supermarkets if one desires to cook at home.  

The provision of a washing machine was excellent. 

We enjoyed our experience there and would love to stay again.

Dee and Johnny. ( Perth Western Australia)

We enjoyed our stay in Chil's place being in a great location in Notting Hill with great access to the tube and bus lines and good places to eat not very far away. Chil was very accommodating with earlier check in as well as later check out. The lounge area is a good size allowing us to spread our stuff out a little, which we needed as the main bedroom does not have much storage space. The apartment was clean and generally well presented. Would recommend  to others wanting to staying a good area with great access to transport and shops.
We enjoyed staying in Brixton and Adriano's place suited our needs well.  Adriano was a considerate host and I would stay here again.

Great location, great value! Comfortable and cozy, steps away from main tube line and all Brixton has to offer. Adriano is charming and pleasant. He was very responsive and easy to communicate with prior to arrival. Since normal check-in is 3pm and our flight arrived around 5 am, he agreed to let us check-in early morning, for a nominal fee, which made a huge difference to us (only possible if nobody uses the flat the night before).
Cheers!

Adriano's apartment is perfect if you have a short stay in Brixton. Location wise it could not be in a better location with great proximity to Brixton village, Academy, underground etc.

The apartment itself is warm with everything  you would expect. The sofa bed is surprisingly comfy and the bed is also fantastic. 

Would 100% recommend Adriano's apartment and we intend on making this our place to stay for future ventures to Brixton!

This flat is perfect for a stay in Brixton. The village, Ritzy and everything else is within easy walking distance and yet is quiet and slightly tucked away. The church tower and clock is just far enough away to hear the time! The local pub The Trinity Arms is a really good traditional London boozer. The flat is clean, modern, warm and comfortable with everything you need and more. Adriano is very helpful and kind - the perfect host.

I had a great stay in Adriano's flat.  Fantastic location (literally 2 minutes walk to Brixton Station), a very nice and well equipped space and Adriano is an excellent and very friendly host.  I would definitely recommend this flat to anyone coming to London wanting to stay close to Central, but away from the tourist area.  Everything you could need is within an easy walk on the rainy days when you don't want to venture far, and at the same time, it's just minutes on the tube to get to central London. If you enjoy Brixton life, you will love Adriano's flat.  I would definitely stay here again.

Adriano is a very friendly host, with clear communication and an easy check-in / check-out process. The apartment is adorable and well equipped with lots of character in a fantastic location. Highly recommended. Many thanks for a fantastic stay, Adriano!
I was looking for a place to host my sisters
Fantastic location, clean flat, very cozy ! thanks !
Great spot, very close to the Brixton tube stop, market, etc. That being said, was also a quiet sleep with courtyard facing room. Would stay here again. Adriano was a communicative and gracious host

Adriano was very friendly, easy to deal with and accommodating.  The apartment was an easy walk to the Underground and bus-stop.  Tesco (grocery store) was also right around the block, which was convenient since we visited it 3 times during our short stay.  Visiting central London was only about a 15-20 minute ride by the Underground, and slightly longer by double-decker bus.  If it is your first time visiting London (as it was mine), I would recommend researching the public transportation options if that will be your means of transportation.  I had not done so, and Adriano was helpful in discussing some options, but we would have had more options with advance planning.  I would recommend the apartment to someone looking for a good deal and willing to be slightly outside of central London.  We saved about half vs. the hotel I had booked in Victoria; and had more room, a full kitchen, etc.
Great neighbourhood, apartment ideally located near great restaurants and the Tube. Adriano was a lovely host. Recommended

Adriano is wonderful host. He is very accommodating and thoughtful. I informed him that this trip was for celebrating my birthday and he sent me a wonderful message wishing me Happy Birthday. He ensured that I was aware of everything in the flat and he also made sure I knew where the key places were in the neighborhood. Wonderful place to stay with a wonderful host.

Adriano was a fantastic host, with quick and easy communication before and during the stay. The apartment is central in that it's a 15 minute trip into London, including walking to the station. Little noise at nights throughout the week, but on weekends there was plenty of noise, so just be prepared for that on Friday and Saturday nights (yet it is London). Well stocked kitchen made preparing meals easy, with a large supermarket 5 minutes walk away. Main bed was comfy and the bathroom spacious for the size of the apartment. Only thing was the TV connection was very poor, but didn't use it much so not a big deal. Would definitely recommend for a more spacious, yet still central base when in London :)
A nice and spacious that gets a lot of light. Well situated on a quiet street in lively Brixton with excellent transport connections. Adriano is a friendly, communicative and helpful host.
Amazing flat, perfect location and amazing host! Will definitely book again when in London! Thank you!!
Nice place close to Brixton station.
it is a great place to live and in good location. the host is very nice. i recommend this house.

Adriano was a fantastic host, went above and and beyond to make sure I was comfortable. The apartment is easy to get to, great tube station access, nearby grocery and pubs. Was in London for a month and this was home base. Absolutely loved Brixton. Would recommend this space.

Small but perfectly formed, this is a lovely, quiet flat just a few minutes from Brixton tube. Very homely & comfy. Hair dryer, iron, well equipped kitchen. Adriano is always informative, available & quick to respond to any question. I had a very easy & agreeable stay at his flat.

Lovely apartment in the heart of Brixton and close to the tube station so access to the city is great. As a host Adriano was very communicative and hospitable for self check-in service. Would very much recommend booking this place for short or long stays in South West London.

Repeat stay at Adriano’s apartment. Highly recommend for many reasons, including: welcoming, comfortable apartment, with thoughtful supply of needed amenities; and wonderful location: nearby transport (Tube, buses, train; a mere 10-15 minutes to heart of the city); Brixton Market, shopping, eateries. And it’s readily accessed from Heathrow via Express and Tube system. Thoroughly enjoyed the stay.

My girlfriend and I hadn't known Alina before we took the leap of faith to rent her flat. Alina just couldn't be nicer! Her flat is comfortable, homey, very sunny, and quiet at night. Her diverse neighborhood rocks! It's full of excellent eateries of varying ethnicities, good supermarkets, etc., etc. Her place is about a 10-minute walk to the Finsbury Park tube stop, and there are also several buses that ply Stroud Green Road. The Piccadilly and Victoria tube lines that serve Finsbury Park are very dependable and come frequently. My only caveat is if you are unwilling to take 20- to 40-minute commutes to downtown London attractions and money is no object, you will prefer to stay downtown. But for anyone else, you will love your experience of living in a real, untouristy neighborhood and dealing with a generous, warm-hearted woman I'm happy to call a new friend.

Thank you Elisa and Dom! We had a great stay at Elisa's charming B&B for 5 days.  The photographs provide a realistic impression of the bedroom and breakfast provided each day.  We appreciated Dom's helpful tourist advice.  It's accessibility to public transport made it easy to access the city centre and the various other places of interest to us.  We used the local car company to take us to the airport at a very reasonable rate, compared to a regular taxi.  We highly recommend staying here.

we stayed at elisa's for 4 days and it was a very pleasant experience. the room looked exactly like in the pictures, it was cosy, clean and a good size for 2 people. we had a nice breakfast every morning in the kitchen, where we made friends with elisa's pet tortoise. also the area is great - westfield mall is in walking distance (many shops, restaurants and a cinema) and so are some nice cafes and restaurants.moreover, it is very easy to get to central london and other places, because there are underground stations, busses and the london overground close by. actually, you can even walk to oxford street if you want some exercise. all in all, highly recommended!

I stayed at Elisa and Dominic's flat for 6 nights.  I would book with them again in a heartbeat if a trip takes me back to London.  They are very friendly and offer great suggestions on getting around of what you might want to do.  Even with my extended stay I saw them infrequently due to my schedule keeping me out all day and coming back late. I never felt unsafe even coming in near midnight walking from downtown. 

The flat is off the main street so inside you have no road noise and compared to the hotel I stayed in the first two nights of my trip it was much quieter since the room over looks their garden.  The bed is comfortable and room is warm.

The location has great food all along the walk to and from Shepherds Bush Market which I mainly used, but Shepards Bush was not more than 2.5 minutes further to walk to if you want other Tube connections.  The breakfast options were diverse and plenty to get you going in the morning.  They have a small pet tortoise that roams the kitchen and was friendly company in the mornings. My last night I had dinner at the Queen Adelaide pub that is highlighted in their listing pictures and I recommend checking it out.

I could go on more and more about how great of time it was to stay here and would recommend their Airbnb listing to all my friends.

We really enjoyed our stay at Elisa's place. We only met briefly but Elisa was very friendly and welcoming! 
The bedroom is a good size and the bed was comfy - there was a good selection of DVDs to watch too. 
Very nice croissants for breakfast :) would definitely stay again again and will recommend.
Thank you for your hospitality and the great recommendations on what to do in London and where to eat. It was a pleasure to stay with you in your home. You made us feel very welcome.
Lovely house, lovely warm welcome, comfortable bed and gorgeous breakfast.  Great people, would definitely stay again.

We had a great time at Elisa & Dominic's place! They are both really warm, gentle and supportive persons and make you feel very welcome! 
They have a great house with a beautiful kitchen! The room is really nice and clean, the bed comfortable and in the mornig you get up, kissed by the sunlight on your face! what a great way to start a new day!

We highly recommend Elisa & Dominic's place!

Thank you guys (also for your help and your good advices)!

This was the perfect base for our London holiday. Everything was spotless without being sterile, and utterly charming. Elisa was delightful, and the neighbourhood was full of vitality and interest. Totally recommended.

We spent two nights at Elisa's home and everything was perfect.
Bedroom and bathroom are as in the picture, perfectly furnished and clean.

The house is a really tipical English terraced house in a quiet residencial street but really close to the metro station (Shepherd's Bush) and bus stops too. So the city center is easy to reach!

When we arrived Elisa was waiting for us and explained everything about the neighbourhood (pubs and restaurants closed to the house), transportation and places to visit while we were having a tea with her.

We really appreciated the location, the bedroom/private bathroom and the family's hospitality. So we definitely recommend Elisa's place if you are planning to visit London.

A very lovely room, comfortable, clean, plenty of room to put your things away, water kettle, tea all set in your room.  The bathroom was very nice and clean.  Big tube and it says it has a "Power" shower?  Well, it DOES!!  Wow, it's AMAZING!!  I'm from California and we have to have things installed into our shower heads so they don't use as much water, it felt so great being blasted with whatever temperature water you want.   I "think" four of the five children were home but..you'd never know it.  The house is very quiet.  If you do run into one of the children, they are so extremely respectful and kind.  OH and the talent they (Website hidden by Airbnb) all over the walls.  Still hoping I get to purchase one of their daughters painted pictures.  Elise and Dom are just super people!  My one and only complaint and I know they have the best that's offered is...the internet doesn't work so great in the room.  But, if you sit at the dining room table it's not a problem.  Such a minor complaint compared to such a wonderful warm home. Thank you Elisa and Don!

Elisa and Dominic are wonderful hosts.  I could not have asked for more.  Lovely breakfast,  very comfortable bed, all facilities were as listed and pictured, and impeccably clean.  Thank you for a lovely stay. Also so easy to get into London,  and great local amenities. Elisa was also very accommodating in allowing me to drop off my bags early before setting off for the day.

It was a very good trip by Elisa.The room Is very comfortable and has a private bathroom as well. The house is very centrally located. All easily accessible by the metro. Thank you for the lovely time.
Nice, quiet, warm place. Good breakfast and nice hosts. Great location!

It was absolutely delightful staying with Elisa and her family!  The room was comfortable, clean and close to the Tube.  They served a delicious breakfast each morning and gave us great advice on what to see and how to get around the city.  I would love to stay with them again when next in London!

I recently stayed in a room in Elisa's house.  The location was great, very close to the Shepherds bush market tube station. The room was lovely, very homely and very comfortable. The whole house had a great mix of old-world, vintage and family home style. If you want to stay in a traditional London period property then this is a lovely place. The breakfast was very nice. I would absolutely recommend this room.

Elisa is a great host! The accomodation description is accurate, you will find a comfortable and clean bed & bath, but also a lovely breakfast served on the gound floor kitchen & dining room. What is more important is the hospitality of the hosts, a friendly and relaxed atmosphere makes you feel almost like at home. The tube station Shepherd's bush market is close. Recommended!

We had a very nice stay at Elisas house. All things were as promised.
Elisa and her familiy were very open, friendly and helpful.
Their house is well located and you could reach the main points very quick.
We were very satisfied.

We loved our stay with Elisa and Dominic and their family. We felt very welcomed and the room was cozy.  They were very helpful with advice on what to see around London and provided a delicious breakfast every morning.  We so enjoyed meeting their children and learning about their lives.
The location is very convenient to the tube and bus service and restaurants. We felt safe in the area.   
We would definitely recommend this home.
Pretty cute place. Clean and near tue station. We had a great time there. Strongly recommend  this B&B.

We had a wonderful time. Dominic and Elisa and their girls were very welcoming, and the room was clean and comfortable. Transportation was quite convenient, and they told us about a great pub down the road which had excellent food. Breakfast was laid out for us daily, allowing us to set our own schedule.  My husband and I recommend them highly.

We had a great experience staying at Elisa's house. The bedroom and private bathroom were exactly as described and shown in the pictures. She provided us with a good breakfast every morning and even let us use her washing machine to wash our clothes.  She and her husband were helpful with directions and various hints that made our experience very enjoyable. She allowed us to keep our luggage at her house past the check out time. We had privacy, yet they were there when we needed something. The house is located very close to public transportation, which made it easy to visit London. I would go back to stay with Elisa any time.
Great place to stay. Thanks Elisa.

It was a pleasure to stay at Elisa's home. The flat was lovely with all this kind of wood things (furniture,floor, pictures). It was really warm. 
The neighbour-hood was really calm, we had a nice sleep.
By foot you can reach the bus station in a few minutes to travel to the city via sheperds bush.

Our stay in London has been great.Elisa and Dominic are delightful hosts. We did not spend so much time together because we were out most of the time, but we felt like home and the breakfast was always ready, which we really appreciated :)
Lovely home and closed to Sheperd's Bush Market Station ( less than 5 minutes on walk) and several bus lines near the house. Highly recommended!!
We enjoyed our little London "home" with Elise and family. All was as stated and Elise was very accommodating to us; helping with questions, directions, etc.

We had a lover time staying at Elisa and her family's place. We enjoyed the hospitality from our hosts. Great and clean room and bathroom. The breakfast was good and we were presently surprised with the company of the their little tortoise :-).
Elisa and Dominique are very kind and helpfull hosts and we spent very good stay in their house With familly charm. Private bathroom and room clean.
Alina was a really good host. The flat is clean and tidy - and really close to Finsbury Park station which is quite close to Central London. I recommend Alina to everyone.

Alina is an amazing host. She made me feel right at home. It was more like hanging out with a friend than a complete stranger. She's very sweet and makes a mean espresso. There are tons of places right around flat to eat and market is close in case you want to cook. I would definitely stay here again if I was in London. Thanks Alina you're awesome.

Alina's place is so nice, the room is big and clean, and the bed is huge. Alina is a great host, and she made sure I had everything I needed, for instance she had put clean towels on the bed for me:) I felt very at home in her place. Aside from that she really helped me out with a lot of things, and even helped me find a permanent place to live in London. So overall a great place to stay with a great girl.
Nice location in Islington area, good for short business trip. House is OK, host is very friendly.

I'm very happy to have been Alina's guest! We've had great time in London and enjoyed our stay. Alina is a great host, we felt us so welcomed by her! 
Alina's house location is very convenient, it's only 5 min walk to Finsbury Park tube station and also a direct (Picadilly) line to Heathrow Airport (in case yu have an early departure you can use the opportunity to sleep a bit in the train :) 
The flat itself is very nice and clean and comfortable, especially the double-bed with new mattress, I slept like a newborn :) And also the red sofa on the small roof terrace is great, I enjoyed the last night London sky!
To all who is going to visit London I highly reccomend Alina and her beautiful house to stay in. Alina, thank you so much and I hope to see you one day again!

I stayed with Alina in her flat in London for a week. It's a wonderful home with a warm feeling and everything you need. Alina went out of her way to make sure I was comfortable and we shared some great chats and meals. I recommend Alina's place to anyone looking for a home for a while in London, and look forward to seeing Alina again.
Alina was a perfect guest and her flat is absolutely wonderful. Highly recommended.

Alina's flat is exceptional one.  
I have to say i have never been to such an atmospheric place like her flat.
Plenty of stunning art items around and all of these pictures and drawings are magnificent and inspirational.
The kitchen is AMAZING. Huge window,  very bright and cozy  furnished with great equipment.

I would highly recommend this flat, 
i have had numerous short term rent in rent
and this one is number one to me.

The House is a piece of Art , there are beautiful portraits everywhere ,  so close to the tube station , on piccaddily and Victoria lines , the host alina is very friendly , welcoming , and polite person , highly recommended
Was great base for my London visit and great support to update me about things to do. l felt very much welcome. Thanks again.
Alina was an amazing host, simply brilliant. Always available and kind, super kind! I miss our discussions in front of coffee or breakfast. Stay in touch!

Lovely relaxed place to stay. Very friendly and thoughtful host would definitely stay again. Very short walk from tube very safe and diverse area. Would definitely stay again and would recommend going to Bar Faltering Fullback for a drink in a local bar

Alina's place is cosy, convenient, and full of eclectic artwork,  and furnishings made by herself personally. She met me at the door and instantly made me feel at home. Entrance is on a major road but the flat is set back so there is very little noise from the street.
Alina, was very quick to respond. Thoughtful and accommodating. Would definitely recommend.
A really nice home and the room was charming! Elisa and her husband were very friendly, flexible and welcoming. I highly recommend!

The room was pleasant; very clean, nicely furnished. neighbourhood is absolutely vibrant and just 8-10 minutes walking to both circle & central lines which makes it very easy to commute to central London. Tho I only met Elisa & her husband and the famous turtle on the morning of my last day, they were very welcoming and very nice people..I enjoyed my stay at their place and felt very comfortable..Thanks Elisa :)

Had a great three-night stay with Elise and Dom, who made me feel right at home. The room and house is as described - comfortable and well located for all the main London attractions.  Only downside is that I had very little time to get to know my hosts better!  I would stay again, and happily recommend to others.

Elisa and Dom were the perfect hosts giving hints and ideas of things to do. Elisa was also very accommodating with an early check in and with allowing us to leave our bags when we checked out. The room it's self was wonderful. Nice comfy bed and a very spacious bathroom. The breakfast each morning was the best. By far our best experience with air bnb. Highly recommend this property,great location also.

Everything was neat and ready on arrival.  The room is as described and has a full bath adjacent to the room.  A great breakfast is provided in a cheerful kitchen/garden setting.  The home is located in easy walking distance of the tube and bus stops in Shepherd's Bush, London.

I stayed at their home for 3 nights. Elisa and her husband are very  nice hosts. I felt very welcomed and comfortable in their home. A nice and quite room overlooking the garden with a very comfortable bed and nice bedlinen. Easy transport into the city.

It was a great experience. I spend 3 days and 2 nights at Elisa and Dominic's place and it was really good. I was with a friend and they were very nice with us. We feel really good in their home and everything was cool.

The district is very calm, we heard anything from the big street of Uxbridge Road which is very crowded. It's easy to access Central London by Underground from there.

So, if you want a nice and calm place, choose them. We'll be very happy by your choice, like I was.

I really had a wonderful time in this lovely accommodation which is located in Sherpherds Bush Market. The room + private bathroom are very cute, calm and clean. The large bed is very comfortable which makes it welcome after a long day in London. Every morning I enjoyed the delicios breakfast in the beautyful kitchen with a nice view in the garden. Sometimes I had a surprising company with the nice tortoise. Elisa is really a wonderful host. When I arrived she received me warmly and helpful. It was a great pleasure having a cup of tea and coffee with her. I enjoyed it very much and would like staying again there when I come back to London.

Elisa and Dom were very welcoming and made us feel really at ease. The facilities were wonderful and our stay there was really comfortable. I would definitely come back to stay here when I go to London again.

Myself and my eight year old son stayed here for four nights. It was the first time we had ever done air bnb. The room and bathroom were as described. Both spotlessly clean, with a comfy bed and lovely bedding. The breakfasts were great and we were left to our own devices which suited us. We had already made plans as to what to do but Elisa and Dom were keen to help with suggestions. The area is well served with public transport, restaurants and shops. My son's highlight of the trip was the tortoise. Thank you for making our trip so easy and enjoyable.

We had an excellent week at Elisas and Dominics house! The room is beautiful and quiet (window to the backyard), the private bathroom is clean and Elisa and Dominic are fantastic people - very helpful and easy going. And the subway station is just a five-minute-walk away. We can highly recommend this place for having a good time and as a perfect basis to explore central London!

Staying with Elisa and her family was great and we couldn' have asked for a better place to stay during our 5-night trip to London. I was visiting London for the first time in my life as well as using airbnb to book an place to stay. 

The neighbourhood was great, there were people on the street even during the night so you didn't feel unsafe at all. I'd call the neighbourhood as a bit like London's Brooklyn, in a good sense, sine there were a lot of different cultures present. 

It was so nice to get free wifi, a warm welcome & goodbye, a great breakfast every morning, great transportation routes around the city, nice bed and a warm shower every day. Still we got the privacy we wanted without feeling lonely in the large house. I strongly recommend staying with Elisa and her family if you are visiting London!

Elisa and Dominic were friendly hosts even if we were mostly busy with our own travelling and them with their work and as such, hardly saw each other. The room is located on the 3rd floor so lugging the luggage up was a bit of a hassle. However, the room was cosy and the bed was most comfortable. The washroom was also exceptionally clean. We also appreciate the effort in setting a nice breakfast for us in the mornings. The neighbourhood is quiet and a 5-minute walk from Shepherd's Bush Market station, and a 10-minute walk from Shepherd's Bush station, which is much more accessible. Elisa and Dominic are really fun people to talk to if you manage to catch them amidst their busy lifestyle.
Alina is an amazing host who welcomed me warmly and was always up for a talk. Her place is in a nice neighborhood with lots of great restaurants around.

Alina is a very relaxed and friendly host who made me completely welcome.  Whilst the room fronted the main road there was no noise and a comfortable bed made for a great night's sleep.  The location is great with so many bars and restaurants on the doorstep.
Felt at home - Alina is an excellent host - very friendly - makes you feel wanted not just tolerated - many thanks
We loved staying at Phillipa's place in Chelsea. The flat was lovely, and the neighborhood was great. Lots of fun shops, and close to two metro stops. We would love to stay there again!

Eliza, Dom and family were immensely hospitable. We felt very relaxed very quickly. Although we probably did not challenge them as hosts, we felt we could have asked them for help with anything and, if they could have helped, they would. Location is good. We felt safe. Tube is literally a few minutes walk away. We did not explore the immediate area but we noticed the huge Westfield Shopping Centre was only one Tube stop away

A great host and a lovely room as described. The house is in a lively, vibrant area of London with loads of ethnic restaurants nearby and also a few nice pubs. Just a few minutes walk from the Tube station.

Elisa's room was fantastic. She was very accommodating and friendly. The private bathroom with the room was also a winner. Anyone looking for a quite room in London for weekend - this is a great choice. Thanks Elisa.
Jay
Great home and friendly atmosphere. Elisa was a great host and helped us with anything we needed. I highly recommend it.

The house was clean, real English style and comfortable.Generous supply of blankets, pillows, and towels. Room was on the last floor with separate bathroom which made our stay more comfortable. The owners of the house we stayed were friendly, opened and helpful. They got in contact with us prior our arrival and gave necessary information to make our stay more convenient. Lovely family.
Cereal Breakfast/Milk/Coffee/Tea/ included. Really great location. Close to underground and shopping center. Variation of different restaurants and fast food shops in 5 minutes walk.
Highly recommend.
If there is need we would stay there again.
Thank you Elisa and Dominic

We immediately felt at home at Elizas and Dominics wonderful cosy family home. When we arrived our room, which was thoughtfully decorated in joyful English charme,  was ready for us and was, aswell as the bathroom, situated next to to our bedroom, very clean. 
Next morning a lovely set breakfast table was already waiting with fresh fruit, cereals, fresh baked croissants, several British jams, joghurt and fresh juice. What a perfect start of the day!
Eliza and Dominic were both very friendly and extremely helpful regarding restaurants, public transport.. we had a lot of fun chatting together at the huge kitchen table while having a cup of tea.
I would definetely recommend Eliza and Dominic as hosts and when we come back to London I hope that they have a room for us.
Thank you for having us :)

Had a wonderful stay at Elisa's place with her family. Loved the area and great places to eat and shop.
 Easy to get to London Centre and surrounding areas. Loved the room we stayed in  and house was beautiful and very eclectic with lots of neat stuff to look at. Great family and great sharing of information.
The'are very Nice. De bedroom was very cute and clean. The bathroom was also Good. We had à great time in London. It was Nice staing at Elisa's place.

Me and my girlfriend stayed with Elisa and Dom for an extended weekend. We had a lovely time in London, were we visited museums and toured London by bus. Our hosts were very friendly and helpful, and we felt very welcome in their home. It was the first time we ever used Airbnb, and it is certainly not the last!

It was very nice to stay at Elisa and Dominic house. The room is supper nice and clean. Dominic welcomed me very warming although i arrived at midnight. The location is perfect. I had enjoyed every breakfast they repaired for me. 
Thank you very much.

It was a great pleasure staying at Elisa and Dominic's house. They are naturally warm, relaxed and open-minded persons. They greeted us with afternoon tea and biscuits, shared with us their traveling experience and advised where and how to visit neighboring sites. They are flexible about check in/out time as well as the time we come in/out the house or using the shower late. We immediately felt home and welcome. Having breakfast in the sunlight-blessed dining room is very enjoyable! We appreciated very much the abundant and versatile breakfast they prepared for us every morning. The house is neat, clean and lovely, well located with easy access to tube and buses. The area is quite and very safe, also convenient with lots of shops and restaurants. The room with private bathroom, equipped with automatic heating, are spacious and comfortable. Besides, I thank them especially for help calling emergency and  found a hospital for my daughter on Sunday morning to fix her teeth retainer problem.  Elisa and Dominic are great hosts and genuinely kind people. We had a wonderful vacation in London thanks to them.

We stayed at Elisa's nice home for 4 nights.  The place is in good location. The main street has ethnic variety, but if you turn to their road, it's very quiet. The room was warm and comforting after walking in chilly London. The private bathroom was very clean. She prepared nice breakfast every morning.  On the last day, even after checkout, she let us leave our luggages so we could pick them up before we headed for the airport later in the afternoon.  We definately recommend their home.
Thank you, Elisa.

great experience , the room rent is very comfortable, the area of the house is very well connected with public services , even at night . excellent also the breakfast service . if I go back again I would choose this house .

Chil's apartment was perfect for our time in London. It's location was fantastic, only a few meters from the Tube station. We found the apartment to be clean, quite spacious and loved the outside patio. Chil also accommodated an earlier check in time which was very much appreciated. We'd definitely consider coming back when in London again.

A comfortable apartment conveniently located near shops, restaurants and tube stations. 
Philippa is a very helpful and friendly hostess. We would recommend her and her apartment to anyone.
Thank you Philippa for an enjoyable holiday.
I really enjoyed my week at Philippa's, the place is ideally situated in Chelsea, and she is a very kind host, I would definitely recommend that you stay there, I will again without any doubt.

I am a little late reviewing this but it is important to me that I do.  Look, the place is in a great location and the neighbor was very friendly.  The place was perfectly comfortable and Philippa gave a lot of helpful information prior to our arrival in England.

However, me and my girlfriend were robbed the second night we were there.  We went out to meet friends and by the time we got back, all of our valuables were taken (computers, iPods, camera equipment, jewelry, etc).  It was upon the arrival of the police that we learned two things:
1)  Rooms here are rented out very, very frequently.  There are always people in and out so it is very obvious that there are tourists coming in and out of here.
2) The locks, as explained by the police, are very inadequate at this location and can be circumvented with extremely simple tactics.

The most aggravating part of this was how we were treated.  We followed all instructions exactly as they were laid out and were very deliberate in making sure everything was perfectly secure as we went in and out of the place.  However, all correspondence with Philippa (through email or through her neighbor) indicated nothing other than it somehow being our fault.  There was very little sympathy and all the commentary centered around what WE did.  Additionally, Philippa basically just stopped replying to emails after we expressed how frustrated we were from her responses and the lack of security and safety in the building.

So, it is a nice place and a convenient location, but the threat of robbery (or God forbid attacks) is just simply too high here.

Very nice flat, and extremely well-located. Great for couples and single travelers. It is small and notes in the lobby indicate that the neighbors don't take kindly to noise--if you are a large family or group, this is probably not the place for you.

Philippa herself was a great host--I very much enjoyed meeting her. She left a great selection of helpful tourist info.
The reservation was canceled 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Elisa and Dom are very inclusive, kind and helpful. The accommodation and facilities are clean and comfortable. I highly recommend their home as a London travel base.
