The apartment was in a great central location for the Olympics and very close to the underground and restaurants.  It was a clean (except for some silver fish in one of the bathrooms) and comfortable apartment.  I was not happy with the number of bathroom towels provided.  There were 5 of us so we were given 5 bath towels, 2 hand towels and no wash clothes.  We were there for 9 days and the washing machine broke early in our stay.  Our towels got a little ripe by the end or our stay. 

Liz was responsive when we emailed her, but I would have liked better communication on confirming our stay as it got closer.  We paid for the flat 6 months in advance because it was for the Olympics so I started to get worried when I did not hear from her.  I finally emailed her just over a week before we were to arrive to confirm our stay and find out how we were to access the flat.  When she responded, she confirmed the place but said nothing about accessing it.  Finally a day before we were to arrive she emailed the access info. 

Lastly, The second day we were there the washing/dryer machine jammed and would not open.  Liz sent someone out to fix it and told us it was a broken handle, but didn't let us know it wouldn't be fixed until after we were gone.  We found this out only after sending an inquiring email.  She never once talked with us about paying for the repair.  When we got home we received an email from an Airbnb mediator to pay for the repair.   Through Airbnb we came to a compromise and paid half of the repair though we did not break the handle.  Liz is responsive and nice, but often does not initiate communication when it would be appropriate and helpful.

Overall, the stay here was pleasant and met all our needs for our time in London.  

Pros: 
Location is close to several tube stations making it easy to get around the city.
Lots of space where you can really spread out, bright with lots of windows.
Numerous restaurants and pubs nearby to get something to eat or drink.
Close to several grocery and pharmacy.
Liz provided a nice welcome guide with recommendations. 

Cons:
Several baby silverfish in the bathrooms.
Front bedroom facing the street can be very noisy at night with pub patrons on their way home. (back two bedrooms were quiet).
Keys and check in details were sufficient without a problem, but not provided until the day prior.

The place is very cosy, very well located, close from the underground and the district is absolutely lovelly, and not far from london centre. Chill has been a great host, doing what he could to make it easy for us. The terrace is a real plus, I recommand this place
Great location, supercool flat
Chil has a great place in a great location.
It was no possible to stay on Chil place but she kindly accommodate us on a hotel

Chil was great as a host. There was a utility emergency the day before we showed up and she booked us a hotel right around the corner. Although we would have loved to stay in her flat, we appreciated the effort she went through to make us comfortable. She definitely won't leave you high and dry.

Perfect little hideaway in a brilliant location.  Yards from Nottinghill Tube with shops and restaurants in your door.  Very effective double glazing as there was no traffic noise once you were inside the flat - quite an achievement in London! I'd definitely recommend staying here, and Chil was very helpful and charming when she greeted us.

It was perfect! In the middle of Notting Hill, nearby everything :-) and the terrace is beautiful, even when we couldnt use it because of the cold, still a perfect place to stay and stare into the christmas-lights.

Nice small house in the Notting Hill / Portobello area. The neighborhood is quite safe and calm. The appartment was nice and cosy.  Small details that bothered us a bit: the sleeping room is a bit humid and once the heating is on the place takes a weird humidity smell.
we didn't regret our rental as  Chil is very nice and warm & the flat is very well located. But it really need a huge cleaning and some  improvments ( like toaster/matress/solid cutlery...)

Chil's place was perfect and offered us the perfect hub to explore London. In addition, she was extremely helpful and helped ensure that our stay was enjoyable! The flat had everything we needed and felt like a home away from home.
Nice flat in the heart of Notting Hill. The terrace is particularly useful if you are coming to London in summer.
Great spot!! Chil is lovely and very communicative. We even extended our stay for a few days which Chil handled with consummate ease!
Great location near the tube. You can get anywhere in the city within 30-45 minutes by train or bus. The place is cute and has a great terrace. Highly recommend staying here.

Great spot for our quick trip to London. Great location - close to Notting Hill Gate tube station and Portobello Market. Pretty easy to get anywhere in the city from this spot. Chil is a wonderful host!

This place is in a really great location , right in the heart of Notting Hill , just few minutes from Portobello Market and the tube station . Lots of bars and restaurants just few doors away . Totally enjoyed our stay , I will definitely recommend it .
Cosy and comfortable. Perfect location. Lovely neighborhood. Would highly recommend!

The apartment is beautiful and very convenient, right by the tube and within walking distance to portobello market. Communication and check in was great, Chil even let us check in earlier since there was no one at the flat the day before. It's just the right size for 2-3 people, with a nice rooftop as well! would love to visit again in warmer months.

Chil's apartment is lovely! The location is absolutely amazing. 15minutes by bus at Marble Arch, Knightsbridge via High street kensington and 10 minutes to paddington. Last but not least, portobello market right around the corner, as well as anything else you need! ATMs, gocery stores, breakfast places, crussh (smoothie café), arancina (next to the apartment. Best coffee & pizza!!) etc. Chil was a great host. She always responded to my e-mails straightaway and was always on hand to help! Fantastic. Even though the place may be quite noisy during the night - it's London life pure. I missed living the big city life and you will love it at Chil's apartment if you wish to experience London at its best and as local as possible:)

Lovely place to stay. It is clean, comfortable with a lovely balcony. It was only a few steps to the Notting Hill Tube station and has lovely shops and resturants near by. It has a really nice layout and appears more spacious than you would think. Perfect for 1-2 people comfortably.

I Loved Chil flat the location is just wonderful easy access to everything and it cosy clean safe and the terrace is a nice place to chill out eat and drink and watch the world go's by ! I will definitely saty there again thanks Chil for the great communication and the immediate response and for the so easy check in and out and I had a wonderful saty and it felt like home .I highly recommend the flat to all people who visits London . Thanks again Chil .
Chip was most helpful on all aspects and always replied to messaged in good time. Home was clean and was also in a fantastic area couldn't of asked for more.

My stay didn't go well i'm afraid.  The bedding was old, musty and smelled of damp.  There are quite a few things which need to be fixed e.g., the toilet flush, the sink doesn't drain, the light downstairs and the bedroom door.   Hopefully Chil will fix these things ahead of the next guest.  The location of the flat is excellent and Chil is a friendly and responsive host.  I just wish it had gone better.
Convenient spot to stay in london. Host is great.
Perfect location, gracious and responsive host, Charming outdoor space!
Excellent spot. Central to Notting Hill, tube, surrounding shops and emenities. Recommend for staying when in the area.
Stayed for a full week -- centrally located nice place
Nice flat , great location .

Chil's place is all about the wonderful location! Right between Notting Hill Gate tube station and Portobello Road Market. It's so central! The rooftop terrace is a lovely spot to enjoy the weather and people watch and living room is very spacious. The bed is a full, so not too wide, and it's a very very soft mattress. We came twice and in between they did a number of renovations including new carpeting which really brightens the space. Great value all in all. Thanks Chil!

Our stay at Chil's place was great - she accommodated our last minute booking, was excellent at communicating and easy to contact. We found that her place was in a great location and the apartment was clean and accurately described. It had enough room to be more than comfortable despite being a one bedroom. Notting Hill Gate is a great place to stay when in London and easily accessible by metro and bus. We would definitely return again!

Great location close to the tube and Hyde Park.  Even though it's in the middle of Notting Hill shops the bedroom is at the back so it's quite.  Could do with some darker curtains in the bedroom though
Very nice little terrace

This is a great place to stay! We loved the roof terrace and enjoyed all of our meals up there. It's so easy to get to the tube and be anywhere within minutes.  We loved our stay!  If you are in the city on a hot day though, do know that there is no air conditioning and the bedroom has little air circulation.
This is a wonderful three-level pad in a super fun and active neighborhood. It's conveniently located next to a Tube and bus stop. Its also in walking distance to the Kensington and Kyoto Gardens.

We loved this Notting Hill flat! Our favorite part was the terrace out back- we made use of it a lot. Chil's place is definitely centrally located- steps from the Notting Hill Gate tube station and less than 5 min walk to Portobello Market. The en suite bathroom was nice, and impeccably clean. The only downsides were that it could get a bit loud in the living room (right on the street, and no privacy with the windows open), but in the bedroom itself it was very quiet. Additionally, it got quite hot and there was only one fan. All in all, we'd recommend to anyone!
Very central location right next to Notting Hill Tube Stop and a short walk to Portobello Market. Amazing little outdoor area outside too!
Lovely place and very gracious hosts. I barely saw them because I was on the go. I was very comfortable and cozy there.
It has been my third time staying at Elisa & Doms place. It was great. I love the cute house, the room and Elisa and Dom are lovely-

Elisa & Dom are great hosts. they gave us a lot of options for the check in and Elisa was very helpful and provided a lot of informations about the house and the neighborhood.
Breakfast is not light at all, it's super, in a large and bright kitchen facing a beautiful garden.
The house is so lovely, confortable and clean and it literally takes 5 minutes from her house to the tube station. 
In addiction to this a lot of London guides and maps are available for the visitors.

We were visiting London for a birthday treat to Kew Gardens. We chose Elisa and Dom's place as it is close enough but also good access to trains and other parts of London. Elisa and Dom were very welcoming, getting in touch during our journey to ensure we were ok and to confirm instructions for the key. Everything worked exactly as they described.
The room was private and comfortable, even though we visited on the hottest weekend! They provided a fan to help us stay cool. We took breakfast in their lovely secluded garden. 

We thoroughly recommend staying with Elisa and Dom if you want to be somewhere with a real local feel and a multicultural centre rather than  the often faceless clinical generic London.

Elisa & Dom's room is quiet and cozy,I really felt like home during these days. Elisa & Dom were kind and willing to talk with us and the breakfast they prepared was amazing! From the house,yoy can go to the city center quite easy by subway or you can go shopping at Westfield,which is the second biggest shoping mall by foot. I really enjoyed staying at their place and I'm also willing to stay next time I come.

Eliza and Dom were lovely hosts. They welcomed us to their home and the room was cosy and quiet. We had a private bathroom and they set out breakfast in the mornings. We had a great stay and would recommend this place to anyone wanting to visit London. 
Freya and Georgia.

Elisa & Dom are very professional hosts. They gave us very clear information and advice for visiting London.  We really enjoyed our conversation with Elisa while having breakfast one morning.  The place is exactly the same as the images shown. The room is cozy and warm which makes you feel like home. It's a short walk to the bus station and tube station. Elisa and Dom were very friendly and made us feel extremely welcome throughout our 4 nights stay.

ELisa and Dom are warm and friendly and their house is lovely. They left out a delicious choice of breakfast materials.  The room was pretty and the bed very comfortable with adjoining modern bath.  Couldn't have been nicer!!

I stoppes in Elisa and Dom's apartment eit my 17 year old daughter. A warm, authentic and welcoming home. But also very private with our room and bathroom on our own little floor. Elisa and Dom was very helpful recommending places to eat etc. Location was perfect on a quiet street but close to restaurants, shops and public transport. Would stop their again.

Mary-Ellen, Norway

This is a great option for anyone looking to stay in west London.

Had a really Pleasant time at Elisa & Dom’s place. Nice and tranquil room, a good place to relax after after a long day in the city.. Elisa & Dom’s are kind and willing to help. Easy access to the city center. I recommend!
Great place to stay. Excellent location, close to tube station. Everything I needed provided and lovely breakfast. Thanks to hosts Elisa and Dom.

Elisha and Doms place was situated off a bustling street full of shops and restaurants of many ethnic groups. You will find Lebanese, Damascus Asian. There were a few places that we very good nearby. They had a very detailed instruction pages (several)  after booking make sure to print it all out it will have lots of ideas and suggestions. They served a delightful breakfast with melon, pastries or bread and granola or oatmeal at the kitchen table for us which was a great way to start our day.  The room is upstairs 2 flights and a bathroom is adjacent. This is their family home so there is some house noise as others are getting ready for there day but it is slight.  A huge modern mall is within walking distance for avid shoppers ( Westfield mall). This was a really different experience from our 1st 2 days in London prior so it was a refreshing change. I would recommend staying at their place.

I had a wonderful stay at Elisa & Dom's place, love the interior design of the house, it looks exactly as its shown on the pictures, actually better. The location is also very convenient, definitely recommending it.

What a cozy room it is!The room is decorated by many art pics.Bus station and circle line is quite close for us to get shopping malls and sightseeing spots.Elisa and Dom also provide breakfast and prepare kinds of fruits before we walk down the (Website hidden by Airbnb) really had a wonderful time at this cute house!
Nice and cosy in an great neighbourhood close to Westfield. Nice decoration in a cosy way and great matress in the room to the backside of the building .

My second stay, this time for seven nights, every bit as enjoyable as my first stay. Very welcoming, friendly and kind hosts. And the place is quiet! Hard to believe one can sleep so soundly in London!

We stayed 4 nights at Dom and Elisa's house. The Room was very nice and clean. Elisa and Dom are wonderful hosts, welcoming and helping with every question. The house is very quiet, breakfast was great. we highly recommend this airbnb experience! Dana& Hagai
Second time staying at this property and it has been lovely once again! Elisa & Dom are great hosts!

This is a perfect retreat from the hustle and bustle of London living, while still very accessible to all the important places. Elisa and Dom gave us a great welcome and our room was warm and comfortable. We would heartily recommend them to anyone who loves easy paced family living with utmost respect for privacy. All in all a great stay!
Awesome place to stay, great that you get your own bathroom, the home is your typical English home it feels very homely and comfortable, lovely little breakfast is an awesome bonus.

We had a lovely stay at Elisa and Dom’s place, would highly recommend to anyone visiting London! Room was lovely, such a nice house with very clean private bath. As we’d been to London before and seen most of the sights, we were mainly targeting the shops for our Christmas shopping. Even for that, Elisa was very helpful there with providing tips which places to go and which to avoid ;-) Great place to stay!

Elisa and Dom's house is described accurately, and a lovely place to stay in central London. Really conveniently located near the tube, and their home is on a really pretty street. Large bedroom with a really comfy bed. Bathroom is clean and a lovely hot shower. Really welcoming and friendly hosts, that provided a really nice breakfast. Thank you, would recommend to others any time!

Great and clean place if you need a central location in London. Great if you have couples (2 queen beds), and big and equiped kitchen. Nice place if you enjoy restaurants and pubs in central London.

Jack and Liz were great hosts - everything work perfectly.
A cozy and lovely flat in a great location. No surprises from the posting, and the owner was very responsive with questions or needs.

I went with five more friends to Liz's apartment in Fitzroy Street. Surely, the best apartment i have ever been to. Firstly, Liz couldn't have been nicer to us!The flat was even better that in the pictures. Everything was great, (two bathrooms and 3 bedrooms). Location couldn't have been better. Everything was within walking distance(british museum, candem town, oxford circuss, pica dilly) or you could get the Warren Street Tube and you arrived everywhere in less than five minutes. The house was very near to Tesco Express and Salsbury Supermarkets, Pharmacies and everything you could ever head. Furthermore, the best night clubs in London (Libertine, Maddox and Cirque du Soire) were all a 15 minute walk. We stayed four days and we didn't have to pick any taxi!. I definitely recommend this house, as when we arrived, it couldn't be more clean. There was a dishwasher, washing machine, iron...everything you could need.
We didn't stay much on the flat as we went on a tourist trip, but it was extremely pleasant arriving to the flat,as it was great located and beds were extremely confortable.
I wont regret staying again in Liz's apartment!
Great location and great apartment !

Pictures are true to the apartment. The apartment is very well located for transports, stores and shopping. The center of london is within walking distance.
The apartment was clean, quiet and well-equipped. Only the noise in the street during the night was a little annoying.
Liz is very attentive to her guests.
I definitely recommend this apartment.
Very nice apartment and excellent location

The flat is well located, a short walk to two tubes stations (Victoria line and Northern line). There is good informational material sent in advance to help with arrival, and good reference material in the flat.
One downside of being well located is that the flat tends to be very noisy at night. Directly across the street is a 140 room LSE student residence, and with a student pub on the street corner, there is a lot of activity directly below the flat between the pub and the residence. We stayed for seven nights, and basically every night was very noisy until late.
This three bedroom flat would be a decent place to stay for the money except for one thing - two of the three beds have extremely poor quality mattresses. Before renting the flat, I specifically asked Liz about the mattress quality, and she assured me that the mattresses were of good quality. Well this was unfortunately for me and my family a blatant misrepresentation. One bed has a decent double mattress. The other two beds have really really bad mattresses, the kind where the springs are to the surface and little or no support or padding. To make matters worse, one of the beds has broken slats, so you sort of ooze downward in the middle. I reported this after our first (sleepless) night, and Liz's partner Jack came over to the flat. I showed him the two bad mattresses, and he seemed surprised at how bad they were, said he agreed that they were not of acceptable quality, and that he'd try to get them replaced immediately, but given it was a Saturday he said in all likelihood we wouldn't get new mattresses delivered until Monday. I said that was ok, and I appreciated his honesty about how bad the mattresses were, and his willingness to deal with the situation. Well, on Monday no mattresses arrived, nor any message from Jack or Liz about a change of plans. After two of my emails went unanswered, Liz finally answered to say that the existing mattresses were actually fine (!), that she's slept in the flat many times and that she's never had complaints before!!!! She didn't bother explaining how Jack could have been so wrong in his assessment. She had the nerve to tell me "different beds suit different people I guess". If the two mattresses were not of throw-away quality, why would Jack suggest replacing them immediately if they were not crappy?? The reason i'm making a big deal of this, as I've told Liz, is that the ONLY question I had of Liz before renting the flat was whether the mattresses were of decent quality.  She misrepresented the facts, and then despite her partner Jack agreeing with me, she would not admit she had lied to me. So buyer beware of what Liz has to say! I would suggest looking elsewhere.

The apartment was lovely and in a perfect location near great places to eat and famous streets of London and landmarks as well so its great for exploring the city. The hosts were so helpful and even made sure to fix the lights in the living room that were damaged by a previous guest before we even got there. They also provided a helpful info pack about London which was great for exploring. I would definitely recommend the apartment and the hosts to other people and hope I can use the apartment again another time.

Very comfortable flat located in a great, central neighborhood! So many restaurants and pubs were within walking distance, as well as grocery stores and shopping. The flat itself was cozy and had everything we needed. Liz was a fantastic host and was always quickly responsive to all of our questions. A great experience in London!

Make sure you understand that there are parking restrictions on their road every single day of the week - even on a Sunday from 9am- 9pm. I got a £60 ticket a Sunday morning at 9.30am and that upset me to be honest and made the stay expensive. 
I think they should do more to ensure guest driving remember because no where else in London do these rules apply and so it's not something as a driver that you automatically think about. A really nice and cosy place. Description was accurate as well. Overall a very pleasant stay despite the owners not being there.
We would highly recommend this lovely home which Elisa and Dom shared with us. The room and facilities were perfect for our needs and public transport and eating places are very near.
Beautiful home, beautiful hosts, most excellent communication! Highly recommend for your stay in London. Close to transport links! A* accommodation!
Loved the place. Cozy, warm and nicely decorated. Highly recommend to anyone!

It was a very good experience! They are so flexible and helpful. It’s a big house, very well located and with an amazing kitchen. As ever, Elise and Dom’s place was brilliant. Comfortable, friendly, with everything you need for a few days. They’re super helpful too.

Had such an incredible experience staying with Elisa and Dom. They offered helpful suggestions for activities and restaurants, breakfast in the morning was amazing, and the room was beautiful. 10/10 would recommend!!
It’s a wonderful comfortable home with absolutely fantastic hosts Elisa and Dom. The location is great. Proximity to public transport is super!! Ideal for couples. Strongly recommend it!!
